NK072(nu)001:1: // rtsa rgyud gsang ba snying po'i dka' gnad la dogs
NK072(nu)001:2: pa gcod pa'i lung rigs rdo rje'i rol rtsed ces
NK072(nu)001:6: rtsa rgyud gsang ba snying po'i dka' gnad la dogs
NK072(nu)001:7: pa gcod pa'i lung rigs rdo rje'i rol rtsed ces
NK072(nu)001:8: bya ba / bla ma dang dpal kun tu bzang po gnyis su med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK072(nu)001:9: rnam mang theg pa'i 'jug sgo ji snyed kyang //
NK072(nu)001:10: rnam grol lam gyi yang gsang snying po'i rgyud //
NK072(nu)001:11: tshig las 'das kyang tha snyad tshig gi don //
NK072(nu)001:12: lung rigs rdo rje'i rol rtsed 'di spro'o //
NK072(nu)001:13: de la 'dir rang gi nye bar gnas pa gnas
NK072(nu)001:14: lnga smra ba'i dwags po 'gyur med blo gsal gyi
NK072(nu)001:15: gsang ba snying po la dogs slong gi lan lung
NK072(nu)001:16: rigs rdo rje'i rol rtsed 'di 'chad pa la /
NK072(nu)001:17: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyi rnam bshad rig par /
NK072(nu)001:18: tshig don bcas shing mtshams sbyar dang /
NK072(nu)001:19: brgal lan bcas te bsnyad par bya //
NK072(nu)001:20: zhes gsungs pa ltar brgal lan gyi sgo nas smra
NK072(nu)001:21: bar bya ste de la dri ba dang po ni
NK072(nu)001:22: / le'u dang po nas bshad pa'i longs sku'i gleng
NK072(nu)001:23: gzhi 'di rang snang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul dang
NK072(nu)001:24: gzhan snang gdul bya'i mthong snang gang yin /
NK072(nu)001:25: yang gnyis ka'i mthong yul yin nam //
NK072(nu)001:26: zhes pa la dang po ltar na le'u dang po
NK072(nu)001:27: nas bshad pa'i ston pa longs spyod rdzogs sku de
NK072(nu)001:28: chos can / khyod zhal phyag mtshan mar snang ba'i gzugs sku yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:29: khyod rnam thar gsum tshang ba'i dbu dkar dmar mthing gsum ye shes drug mtshon pa'i phyag drug /
NK072(nu)001:30: thabs shes gnyis mtshon pa'i zhabs gnyis dang ldan pa'i gzugs sku yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:33: khyed sangs rgyas rang snang gi sku yin pa thal /
NK072(nu)001:34: khyod mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar bzhugs pa'i gzugs sku yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:37: sangs rgyas rang snang na mtshan ma can gyi sku yod par thal /
NK072(nu)001:38: sangs rgyas rang snang na mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar bzhugs pa'i gzugs sku yod pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:39: 'dod na rang snang sangs rgyas zhing khams chos can /
NK072(nu)001:40: khyod mtshan ma las 'das pa'i chos ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:41: khyod mtshan ma dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:43: lta ba yang dag sgron mar /
NK072(nu)001:44: mtshan ma med cing spros dang bral ba de //
NK072(nu)001:45: ngo bo nyid kyi sems kyi yul las 'das //
NK072(nu)001:48: yang dag shes rab chen po ni /
NK072(nu)001:50: zhes sogs bshad pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir yang mtshan
NK072(nu)001:51: ma dang bcas pa yin gzugs sku ma yin zhes
NK072(nu)001:53: le'u dang po nas bshad pa'i ston pa longs spyod rdzogs sku chen po /
NK072(nu)001:54: khyod phyag zhabs 'khor lo mtshan dang rus sbal zhabs //
NK072(nu)001:55: zhes sogs bshad pa ltar gyi mtshan dpe 'bar ba'i sku ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:56: khyod gzugs sku ma yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:60: dang po'i sku ni stobs la sogs //
NK072(nu)001:61: bral ba'i yon tan dag dang ldan //
NK072(nu)001:62: gnyis pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan //
NK072(nu)001:63: rnam smin yon tan dag dang ldan //
NK072(nu)001:64: zhes bshad pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)001:65: gzhan yang sangs rgyas rang snang gi sku de gdul bya'i mthong yul du yod par thal /
NK072(nu)001:66: le'u dang po longs sku'i gling bzhi'i ston 'khor 'di
NK072(nu)001:67: rnams sa mtha'i sems dpa' la snang ba'i phyir te
NK072(nu)001:69: 'og min bla med gnas mchog tu //
NK072(nu)001:70: sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul //
NK072(nu)001:71: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor rnams la //
NK072(nu)001:72: de bzhin gsungs mchog mi smra ste //
NK072(nu)001:73: sku yi chos rnams mjal bar ston //
NK072(nu)001:75: 'dod na rang snang sangs rgyas kyi sku de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:76: gdul bya'i mthong yul du med par thal /
NK072(nu)001:77: sangs rgyas kho na'i spyod yul yin pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:79: ji ltar mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa //
NK072(nu)001:80: de dag byis pa'i spyod tshul te //
NK072(nu)001:81: gang zhig mtshan nyid kun med pa'i //
NK072(nu)001:82: sangs rgyas rnams ni mi mthong ngo //
NK072(nu)001:84: 'o na rang snang sangs rgyas mtshan nyid pa de sems can gyis mi mthong na /
NK072(nu)001:85: sangs rgyas kyis sems can la gzigs pa mi 'jug pa'i skyon dang /
NK072(nu)001:86: sems can gyis sangs rgyas mi mthong ba'i skyon gnyis gnas so zhe na /
NK072(nu)001:87: skyon dang po med de rgyal ba rnams kyis ni
NK072(nu)001:88: sems can la 'brel ba gsum gyi yul du byas
NK072(nu)001:89: pas gzigs te / chos dang chos can rang bzhin gyis 'brel /
NK072(nu)001:90: yul dang yul can tha mi dad par 'brel /
NK072(nu)001:91: las dang thugs rjes yongs su bzung bar 'brel bas
NK072(nu)001:92: thugs rje'i 'brel pas yongs su bzung ba'i phyir te
NK072(nu)001:94: thugs rje chen pos 'brel bas na //
NK072(nu)001:95: 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang //
NK072(nu)001:98: sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas dngos gnas mi mthong ba ni /
NK072(nu)001:99: sems can rnams kyi sgo nas 'brel pa'i yul du
NK072(nu)001:100: ma byas pas dngos gnas ji lta ba bzhin mi
NK072(nu)001:101: mthong yang / rang rang gi las nyon dag tshab
NK072(nu)001:102: che chung la ltos nas rang rang gi las 'phro'i
NK072(nu)001:103: mos pa dang mtshams pa so sor snang ste /
NK072(nu)001:105: de bzhin nyid kyi ma bcos kyang //
NK072(nu)001:106: las 'phro'i dbang gis so sor snang //
NK072(nu)001:108: mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ngo //
NK072(nu)001:110: 'o na dud 'gro dang yi dwags phal pa dag
NK072(nu)001:111: gis de bas ches bsod nams kyi 'phags pa'i mi
NK072(nu)001:112: rnams dang / spyod yul gcig tu ma spyad kyang mi rnams kyi mthong ba bzhin du /
NK072(nu)001:113: rgyal ba rnams dang ye shes mi mthun par ma gyur kyang mthong du cis mi rung zhe na /
NK072(nu)001:115: de 'dra'i dpe don mi mtshungs te //
NK072(nu)001:116: 'gro ba de nyid kyis mi'i gzugs mthong yang mtshan
NK072(nu)001:117: nyid nyams su myong ba'i sgo nas mi mthong ba'i
NK072(nu)001:118: phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni bsam
NK072(nu)001:119: gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas yin pas dag pa'i sems
NK072(nu)001:120: can rnams kyis kyang spyod yul du ma gyur pa'i
NK072(nu)001:121: phyir dang / phyir te / rgyud bla ma las /
NK072(nu)001:122: sangs rgyas khams dang sangs rgyas byang chub dang //
NK072(nu)001:123: sangs rgyas phrin las sangs rgyas ye shes te //
NK072(nu)001:124: dag pa'i sems can rnams kyis bsam bya min //
NK072(nu)001:127: blo mig dag pa'i 'phags mchog gis kyang thams cad mthong ma lags //
NK072(nu)001:129: dri ba gnyis pa gdul bya'i mthong snang yin zer na /
NK072(nu)001:130: le'u dang po'i ston 'khor gyi rnam par snang ba 'di rnams chos can /
NK072(nu)001:131: gang zag gcig gi phung khams skye mched rgyal ba
NK072(nu)001:132: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su rnam par dag pa'i mthar
NK072(nu)001:133: thug 'bras bu ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:134: mthar thug gi 'bras bu de blo'i yul du bzung
NK072(nu)001:135: byar ma grub pa'i zhal phyag mtshan ma'i spros pa
NK072(nu)001:136: dang bral ba gcig tu khas len dgos pa'i phyir
NK072(nu)001:137: te / thun mong gi lung las kyang /
NK072(nu)001:138: don dam blo yis spyod yul min //
NK072(nu)001:139: blo ni kun rdzob yin par brjod //
NK072(nu)001:143: mthar thug gi 'bras bu yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:144: skabs 'dir de las lhag pa'i 'bras bu bzhag tu med pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:146: 'bras bu rgyal ba smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis //
NK072(nu)001:149: don bsdus gsung rab bzhi bcu gnyis //
NK072(nu)001:150: de las lhag pa'i don smra ba //
NK072(nu)001:151: de ni rnam dag lam min te //
NK072(nu)001:152: rang blos bsam pa 'khrul pa yin //
NK072(nu)001:154: yang gong du ma khyab pa'i lan /
NK072(nu)001:155: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po de mthar thug gi 'bras bu yin zer na /
NK072(nu)001:157: gdul bya'i mthong yul gyi sku yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:158: sa mtha'i sems dpa' la snang ba'i sku yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:161: gdul bya la snang ba'i sku min par thal /
NK072(nu)001:162: sangs rgyas rang snang gi ye shes kyi rtsal snang las grub pa'i sku yin pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:164: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dbang bsgyur ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i dang //
NK072(nu)001:165: rang snang bar nyid ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan sgyu ma rnam dag gsal ba yi //
NK072(nu)001:166: sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las sel med pa yi yon tan yid bzhin rin po che //
NK072(nu)001:167: mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid du'o //
NK072(nu)001:169: sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las sel med ces pa ni /
NK072(nu)001:170: gdul bya'i blo'i sel slad med par sangs rgyas kho
NK072(nu)001:171: na'i spyod yul yin pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro
NK072(nu)001:172: // yang gong du ma khyab pa'i lan dngos 'gal la song mod kyang /
NK072(nu)001:173: de dag gi tshe na thub pa drug kyang gdul bya la dngos su mi snang bar thal /
NK072(nu)001:174: thub drug ma drangs par bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis mi tshang ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:175: de dag gi rnal ma'i lan go don lam bzhag gi dbang du byas na /
NK072(nu)001:176: le'u dang po'i ston 'khor gyi rnam par snang ba 'di dag sangs rgyas dngos ma yin kyang /
NK072(nu)001:178: gdul bya blo dag pa'i blo'i me long la shar
NK072(nu)001:179: ba'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan yin par go ste
NK072(nu)001:180: / rgyu mtshan sgyu 'phrul rdo rje las /
NK072(nu)001:181: rdo rje btsan po dam tshig mchog /
NK072(nu)001:182: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub che //
NK072(nu)001:183: 'gro ba kun la rab snang ba'o //
NK072(nu)001:186: ji ltar beed+aura sa gzhi gtsang ma la //
NK072(nu)001:187: lha dbang lus kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba ltar //
NK072(nu)001:188: de bzhin 'gro sems sa gzhi gtsang ma la //
NK072(nu)001:189: thub pa'i dbang po'i sku yi gzugs brnyan 'char //
NK072(nu)001:191: dngos yin pa la gnod byed yod de /
NK072(nu)001:192: bee d+aur+ya'i sa gzhi la snang ba'i brgya byin gzugs brnyan brgya byin dngos ma yin pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:193: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan sangs rgyas dngos ma yin pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:194: gong du lung drangs pa rnams dang /
NK072(nu)001:195: 'dir yang sher phyin sum brgya pa las /
NK072(nu)001:196: gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong //
NK072(nu)001:197: gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa //
NK072(nu)001:198: logs pa'i lam du zhugs pa ste //
NK072(nu)001:199: skye bo de dag nga mi mthong //
NK072(nu)001:200: sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku //
NK072(nu)001:201: 'dren pa rnams ni chos nyid blta //
NK072(nu)001:202: chos nyid shes par bya min pas //
NK072(nu)001:203: de ni rnam par shes mi nus //
NK072(nu)001:206: ji ltar mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa //
NK072(nu)001:207: zhes sogs gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)001:208: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis mthar thug gi 'bras bu yin mod /
NK072(nu)001:209: de mthong du mi rung na /
NK072(nu)001:210: gzhan snang gzugs sku gnyis kyang mthar thug 'bras bu
NK072(nu)001:211: ma yin par khas len dgos ha cang thal lo
NK072(nu)001:213: dri ba gnyis pa mtshan dpe'i dogs slong ni /
NK072(nu)001:214: ye shes bcu drug gi rtsal sems dpa' bcu drug tu bcad pas /
NK072(nu)001:216: skye mched khams rnams mang po kun //
NK072(nu)001:217: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
NK072(nu)001:219: ma dag pa'i dus kyi khams bco brgyad kyang skyes bu gcig la rdzogs yong ba ltar /
NK072(nu)001:220: sangs rgyas pa'i gnas skabs su yang ston pa'i yon
NK072(nu)001:221: tan gyi bye brag 'khor gyi tshul du bshad pa'i
NK072(nu)001:222: phyir phyi sems yab yum bzhi dang /
NK072(nu)001:223: nang sems yab yum bzhi ste bcu drug byung zhing /
NK072(nu)001:224: lhag ma bcu drug po brtsi tshul ji ltar yin dang /
NK072(nu)001:225: 'dir nang sems yab bzhi rnam shes dang /
NK072(nu)001:226: phyi sems yab bzhi dbang po dang brang sprad ste bshad pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:227: zhi ba gnas dag gi skabs su /
NK072(nu)001:228: rnam shes tshogs brgyad gnas dag pa //
NK072(nu)001:229: sems dpa' brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang //
NK072(nu)001:230: rnam shes yul brgyad gnas dag pa //
NK072(nu)001:231: sems ma brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang //
NK072(nu)001:232: zhes pas lha rtog sbyar lung mi 'dra ba ji ltar lags /
NK072(nu)001:234: ston pa'i thugs ye shes chen po'i bdag nyid du gnas pa de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:235: khyod me long lta bu sogs ye shes bzhi po
NK072(nu)001:236: re re la'ang bzhi rer phye ba'i ye shes bcu
NK072(nu)001:237: drug gi rtsal sems dpa' bcu drug /
NK072(nu)001:238: de'i yul chos kyi dbyings bcu drug las sems ma
NK072(nu)001:239: bcu drug ste mtshan so gnyis su bzhag pa ma
NK072(nu)001:240: yin par thal / sems dpa' bcu drug por ye
NK072(nu)001:241: shes lnga'i rtags rigs lngas dbu brgyan pa'i lha brgyad
NK072(nu)001:242: cu ni dpe byad brgyad cur 'chad pa mi rigs
NK072(nu)001:243: yin par thal / pa'i phyir / 'dod na /
NK072(nu)001:245: mtshan gyi me tog la dpe byad kyi 'bras bu spras pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:246: sras kyi tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan pa'o //
NK072(nu)001:247: zhes bshad pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)001:248: rnal lan phyi nang gi sems ma bcu drug ni /
NK072(nu)001:249: rgyu skal bzang gi sems dpa' sems ma dang sbyar nas bshad pa yin la /
NK072(nu)001:250: mtshan dpe'i skabs 'dir 'bras bu dpe bral gyi sems
NK072(nu)001:251: dpa' yab bcu drug dang yum bcu drug po mtshan
NK072(nu)001:252: dang / yum bcu drug po chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya yin pas dbu brgyan med cing /
NK072(nu)001:253: yab bcu drug por ye shes lnga'i rtags kyi dbu
NK072(nu)001:254: brgyan gyi lha lnga re bsdoms pa brgyad cu dpe
NK072(nu)001:256: gnas dag gnas bsgyur gyi skabs su ni spyir btang
NK072(nu)001:257: yul yul can gtso che ba byas pas 'dra bar
NK072(nu)001:258: sems te de ltar min na /
NK072(nu)001:259: yid shes ston pa kun bzang su dag sbyor gcig dang /
NK072(nu)001:260: tshogs brgyad kyi skabs su sems dpa' brgyad kyi nang
NK072(nu)001:261: tshan du dag sbyor byung ba zlos skyon gnas shing
NK072(nu)001:262: / shes pa gcig phra rags kyi gnas skabs phye bas tshogs brgyad byung zhing /
NK072(nu)001:263: de'i cha rnams dag sbyor byas pa sems dpa' brgyad dang /
NK072(nu)001:264: yid ni chos thams cad kyi byed pa po yin
NK072(nu)001:265: pas byed las sgo nas ston pa kun bzang du
NK072(nu)001:268: yid gtso yid ni mgyogs par 'gro ba ste //
NK072(nu)001:269: chos rnams kun gyi sna la yid 'agro'o //
NK072(nu)001:271: nang gi mtshan dpe'i skabs spyi bo bde chen gyi
NK072(nu)001:272: 'khor lo rtsa 'dab so gnyis ni mtshan bzang po
NK072(nu)001:274: lte ba'i rtsa 'dab re bzhi las stong pa'i rtsa bzhi phri ba'i drug cu /
NK072(nu)001:276: snying ga'i rtsa chen bzhi ste brgyad cu ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcur bshad pa /
NK072(nu)001:278: khyod nang gi stong pa'i mtshan dpe ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:279: khyod rtsa 'khor gyi rnam par 'dug pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:282: sgra dbyangs gsung gi gnas gzhi yi //
NK072(nu)001:283: dbye bas gsum gsum nges gnyis dang //
NK072(nu)001:284: bzhi bcu gnyis su gyur pa yin //
NK072(nu)001:285: zhes gsungs pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)001:286: gsang ba'i mtshan dpe chos can /
NK072(nu)001:287: khyod ston pa yab yum gnyis rol ba'i dus kyi dga' ba la 'jog pa ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:288: khyod yab yum gnyis kyi dga' ba bcu drug bcu drug ni mtshan so gnyis dang /
NK072(nu)001:289: yab kyi dga' ba re re la'ang ye shes lnga
NK072(nu)001:290: lnga'i re dang ldan pa ni dpe byad brgyad cur
NK072(nu)001:293: a li k+aa li bde ba nyid //
NK072(nu)001:294: phan tshun ma 'dres gcig par shes //
NK072(nu)001:295: bcu drug ngos gnyis mtshan dang ldan //
NK072(nu)001:296: phyogs gcig ye shes lnga ldan pa //
NK072(nu)001:297: brgyad cu'o bzod sogs rgyu las 'phags //
NK072(nu)001:300: nang dang gsang ba'i mtshan dpe chos can /
NK072(nu)001:301: khyod mdzes byed kyi rgyan ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:302: khyod rtsa khams kyi rang bzhin du 'dug pa'i phyir zer na /
NK072(nu)001:303: rtsa khams rnam par dag pa'i chos can /
NK072(nu)001:304: khyod rgyan gyi nang nas mdzes byed mchog tu gyur pa yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:305: khyod bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du ro snyoms
NK072(nu)001:306: pa'i ye shes chen po'i rgyan du gnas pa'i phyir
NK072(nu)001:308: khyod ye shes kyi sku can ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:309: khyod rtsa rlung thig le ldan pa'i sku yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:312: khyod 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe rtsa rlung thig le rnams
NK072(nu)001:313: chos nyid kyi klong du grol nas sangs rgyas pa
NK072(nu)001:315: khyed rtsa rlung thig le dang ldan pa'i sku yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:318: rtsa dag pas sku rdo rje /
NK072(nu)001:319: rlung dag pas gsung rdo rje /
NK072(nu)001:320: thig le ste rdul dag pas thugs rdo rje thob pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:322: khyod ye shes kyi sku can yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:323: khyod sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad zhal
NK072(nu)001:324: gyi dkyil 'khor thal le bar snang ba'i sku yin
NK072(nu)001:325: pa'i phyir te / ye shes nyid gdul bya'i snang
NK072(nu)001:326: ngor dbyibs dang kha dog tu rang snang ba'i phyir
NK072(nu)001:327: pa'i phyir te / te / 'di nyid las /
NK072(nu)001:328: ye shes la ni ye shes rol //
NK072(nu)001:329: ye shes rol pa nyid kyi gsob //
NK072(nu)001:330: rgyal ba mngon byung bskyab pa dang //
NK072(nu)001:331: byin rlabs ston pa de bzhin no //
NK072(nu)001:333: yang gsang ba'i mtshan dpe'i skabs /
NK072(nu)001:334: yum gyi dga' ba bcu drug po de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:335: khyod yab la yod pa'i chos yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:336: khyod yab kyi sku la brtan pa'i mtshan du drangs 'dug pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:339: yum la ldan pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:341: thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan dpe zhes /
NK072(nu)001:342: ston pa dang 'chad pa'i skyes bu lnga kho na la ldan pa'i khyad chos su bzhag 'dug par /
NK072(nu)001:343: de ltar na kun tu bzang mo dang 'khor gzhan rnams la'ang mtshan dpe mi ldan par thal /
NK072(nu)001:344: thun min gyi mtshan dpe de ston pa dang 'chad
NK072(nu)001:345: pa'i skyes bu gnyis kyi khyod chos yin pa'i phyir
NK072(nu)001:348: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di rnams gang zag gcig
NK072(nu)001:349: sangs rgyas pa'i yon tan gyi rtsal snang lhar bzhag
NK072(nu)001:351: lha de dag la mtshan dpe'i yon tan yod mod kyi /
NK072(nu)001:352: bzang ngan can du gnas pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:355: don bsdus gsung rab bzhi bcu gnyis //
NK072(nu)001:358: gzhi gnas lugs 'chad pa'i skabs 'dir sems can yin na /
NK072(nu)001:359: mtshan dpe dang ldan pas khyab pa gcig khas len dgos te /
NK072(nu)001:360: thun mong gi lung mdog myang 'das las kyang /
NK072(nu)001:361: sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi nang na mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis yod de /
NK072(nu)001:362: dpe byad bzang po brgyad du yod do //
NK072(nu)001:365: zhes sogs bshad pa'i phyir rnal ma'i lan /
NK072(nu)001:366: ston pa yab yum gnyis po ya mi 'bral te /
NK072(nu)001:367: gcig gi yon tan gcig la yod par khas len /
NK072(nu)001:368: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po thams cad la ngo bo'i sgo nas bzang ngan med kyang /
NK072(nu)001:369: gdul byar snang ba'i cha nas thun min gyi mtshan
NK072(nu)001:370: dpe ldan mi ldan gnas skabs kyi snang cha gtso
NK072(nu)001:371: che chung la ltos na bzhag par mngon /
NK072(nu)001:372: ye shes kyi sku gdul byas mi mthong na ha cang thal zhing /
NK072(nu)001:373: slob dpon pad+ma sogs dang sa gnas kyi sems dpa' tha dag ye shes kyi sku can yin te /
NK072(nu)001:374: rang lus gdod nas phyag rgya che //
NK072(nu)001:375: sgom pas mngon du gyur pa'i lha //
NK072(nu)001:376: zhes sogs rgya cher bshad pas so //
NK072(nu)001:377: rtsa rlung thig le la spu ris 'byed de /
NK072(nu)001:378: gdod nas grub pa'i rtsa rlung thig le ye ji bzhin pa'i rigs lngar bshad pa'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)001:379: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK072(nu)001:380: zhes pa 'di ston pas gsungs sam /
NK072(nu)001:381: sdud pa pos brtsams pa'i tshig gang yin zhes pa la /
NK072(nu)001:382: ston pas ston pa la phyag 'tshal ba dgos med du thal /
NK072(nu)001:383: de ltar btsal ba thug med du 'gyur ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:384: gnyis pa ltar na gsang bdag lag na rdo rje de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:385: khyod ston pa dang dgongs pa dbyer med ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:386: bshad ces pa de ston 'khor dgongs pa dbyer med
NK072(nu)001:387: kyi phyogs nas bzhag pa'i thugs nges kyi gleng gzhi
NK072(nu)001:388: las khyad par 'phags pa'i 'phags chos su bshad pa'i
NK072(nu)001:390: 'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga //
NK072(nu)001:391: rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa'ang nga //
NK072(nu)001:394: rgyud 'dis gleng gzhi ma tshang bar thal /
NK072(nu)001:395: 'di skad bshad pa zhes pa'i gleng gzhi de ston pa'i gsungs gang zhig /
NK072(nu)001:396: gleng gzhi ston pas dngos su ma gsungs pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:397: nyi 'od seng ge'i rgya cher 'grel pa las /
NK072(nu)001:398: bka' thams cad mgo bor gleng gzhi dang /
NK072(nu)001:399: sgab tu mngon par bstod pa chug la bka' yang dag pa'i don dang mi 'gal bar sgrogs shig /
NK072(nu)001:401: yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad sku gsung thugs su snang ba zhes pa'i rjes su /
NK072(nu)001:402: thabs shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis /
NK072(nu)001:404: sku gsung thugs sna tshogs la zhabs gnyis las med par thal /
NK072(nu)001:406: yang sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu
NK072(nu)001:407: gsum dang ldan pa zhes pas sku gsung thugs bsam
NK072(nu)001:408: gyis mi khyab la dbu gsum las med par thal
NK072(nu)001:409: / de ltar bshad 'dug pa'i phyir yang /
NK072(nu)001:410: rgya phyogs bcu yongs su ma chad pa zhes pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:411: gru bzhir gyur pa zhes pa 'gal te /
NK072(nu)001:412: rgya ma chad na gru bzhir snang ba mi 'thad de /
NK072(nu)001:413: gru bzhir snang ba ste nam mkha' go phye nas gru bzhir snang ba yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:414: phyi dang nang med pa zhes pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:415: kun tu yang nang du gyur pa zhes bshad pa 'gal te /
NK072(nu)001:416: kun tu nang du gyur pa yin na phyi nang yod pa yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:417: yang gdan gyi skabs su dbus su seng ge /
NK072(nu)001:421: byang du shang shang ste srog chags re re yang
NK072(nu)001:422: brgyad brgyad du gnas nas khri rkang 'dogs pa ma
NK072(nu)001:423: yin par thal / khri re re la srog chags lnga ka ma tshang ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:424: de ltar ma tshang dgos te rtags srog chags lnga
NK072(nu)001:425: po khrir snang ba don mi 'jigs pa bzhi stobs
NK072(nu)001:426: bcu / rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi dbang bcu /
NK072(nu)001:427: phrin las bzhi rnams thugs su chud pa'i don rtags khri rkang 'degs pa'i rnam par shar bas te /
NK072(nu)001:428: dbang bskur rgyal po'i rgyud las /
NK072(nu)001:429: thugs ni mi 'jigs bzhi yis bdud bzhi 'joms //
NK072(nu)001:432: gdan gyi srog chags lnga po 'di rgyud mas sbyangs yin pa mi 'gal te /
NK072(nu)001:433: smon lam gus pa'i gdan byang chub sems dpa' lus
NK072(nu)001:434: gdan du phul nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa sbyong
NK072(nu)001:435: ba'i phyir / rna bas chos nyan nas shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyong zer ba yang mi 'thad de /
NK072(nu)001:436: gdan gyi srog chags kyi rnam par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:437: khyod nyon sgrib sbyangs zin pa'i gang zag ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:438: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang lus gdan du phul nas nyon sgrib sbyong ba'i phyir 'dod na /
NK072(nu)001:440: khyod nyon sgrib zad par spangs pa'i gang zag yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:441: khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gnas pa'i gang zag yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:442: de ltar yang gser 'od dam pa las /
NK072(nu)001:443: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dag nas sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku'i zhal mthong ngo //
NK072(nu)001:444: shes bya'i sgrib pa dag nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i zhal mthong ngo //
NK072(nu)001:445: snyoms 'jug gi sgrib pa dag nas sangs rgyas chos kyi sku'i zhal mthong ngo //
NK072(nu)001:446: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang thun mong gi theg pa'i skabs su yang /
NK072(nu)001:447: nyon sgrib ni sa dang po thob pa dang dus mnyam du spang bar bshad pa'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)001:449: rgyud 'di ston pas bsdus sam 'khor gyis bsdus /
NK072(nu)001:451: dang po ltar na 'di'i sdud pa po de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:452: ston pa ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:453: 'khor gyi nang nas skal ba dang ldan pa'i gsang
NK072(nu)001:454: bdag lag na rdo rje de yin pa'i phyir te
NK072(nu)001:456: 'khor gyi nang na skal ldan mchog /
NK072(nu)001:457: 'dul ba'i dus babs gsang ba'i bdag /
NK072(nu)001:458: lag na rdo rjes bsdu ba mdzad //
NK072(nu)001:462: khyod kyi rgyud 'di ming tshig tu bsdus par thal /
NK072(nu)001:463: de ltar bsdus nas gtan la phabs pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:466: khyod kyi ming tshig sgrar snang ba'i ches gsung pa
NK072(nu)001:467: yod par thal chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong ming
NK072(nu)001:468: tshig sgrar snang ba'i sgo nas gsungs pa'i phyir te
NK072(nu)001:470: ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa
NK072(nu)001:471: stong phrag brgyad cu'i gnyen por chos kyi phung po
NK072(nu)001:472: stong phrag brgyad cu gsungs so //
NK072(nu)001:477: ston pas sgra dang ming tshig tu snang ba'i chos 'bru gcig kyang gsungs pa med de /
NK072(nu)001:479: sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das //
NK072(nu)001:481: dper na brag cha'i sgra bzhin no //
NK072(nu)001:483: thun mong gi lung las kyang /
NK072(nu)001:484: nga mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas pa gang gi nub
NK072(nu)001:485: mo nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar tshig dang
NK072(nu)001:486: yi ger snang ba 'bru gcig kyang ma gsungs so
NK072(nu)001:488: yang ston pas ma gsungs so zhe na /
NK072(nu)001:491: khyed kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyungs nas gsungs pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:492: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
NK072(nu)001:495: ston pas ming tshig yi ger snang ba'i chos ma gsungs kyang /
NK072(nu)001:496: dper na brag cha'i ngos nas sgra ma brjod kyang
NK072(nu)001:497: skyes bu'i ji ltar smras pa'i brag cha'i sgra lan
NK072(nu)001:498: du byung ba ltar sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid du
NK072(nu)001:499: gnas pa las ma g.yos kyang /
NK072(nu)001:500: gdul bya'i snang ngor thugs rje gsung gi byin rlabs
NK072(nu)001:501: so so'i blo dang 'tshams par 'byung ba yin te
NK072(nu)001:503: de bzhin nyid kyi gsungs pa med //
NK072(nu)001:504: yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung //
NK072(nu)001:505: ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyungs yang //
NK072(nu)001:506: thugs rje gsung gi byin rlabs kyis //
NK072(nu)001:507: 'gro don sna tshogs so so gsal //
NK072(nu)001:508: gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje'i mchog /
NK072(nu)001:509: de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos kyang //
NK072(nu)001:510: dper na brag cha'i sgra bzhin no //
NK072(nu)001:513: gang zag la rang rgyud dang sprul pa ba gnyis las /
NK072(nu)001:514: spyir sems can gyi don la bsam bzhin du skye ba bzhes pa sprul pa ba dang /
NK072(nu)001:515: rang gi rang ma rig pas 'khrul te dbang med
NK072(nu)001:516: du 'khor bar skyes pa ni rang rgyud pa yin
NK072(nu)001:517: 'dra yang zhib tu phye na khas len la ltos
NK072(nu)001:520: nga yi 'di kun khyab pa de //
NK072(nu)001:521: 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ma mthong //
NK072(nu)001:524: mdor na gdod ma'i sems las 'phros pa'i phyir //
NK072(nu)001:525: skye ba bzang ngan kun kyang de'i rnam sprul //
NK072(nu)001:526: rba rlabs chu las gzhan du g.yos pa med //
NK072(nu)001:528: dag ma dag thams cad chos nyid kyi rol rtsal las ma 'das pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:529: bla med kyi theg pa 'di'i grub mthar sems can
NK072(nu)001:530: thams cad sprul pa rab khas blangs na skyon e
NK072(nu)001:531: yong lags / zhes pa la grub mtha' 'di'i skabs su tha snyad snang lugs dang /
NK072(nu)001:534: sems can thams cad sprul pa bar khas blangs na /
NK072(nu)001:536: srid par snang ba'i sems can 'di dag bdag 'dzin
NK072(nu)001:537: gyi rgyu las byung ba'i log rtog 'khrul par gnas
NK072(nu)001:539: srid rtse'i nyes dmigs bdag tu rtogs las 'phros //
NK072(nu)001:540: zhen dang log par rtog pa tsam zhig las //
NK072(nu)001:541: phra zhing zab pa'ang yod ma yin //
NK072(nu)001:543: theg pa chen po'i byang chub kyi sems rgyud la skyes pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:544: rang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa'i lam gyi rgyur 'gro
NK072(nu)001:545: ba'i dge tshogs sgrub nus phan chad sangs rgyas kyi
NK072(nu)001:546: sprul pa yin par khas blangs pa la skyon med
NK072(nu)001:548: byang chub sems bskyed gyur nas skad cig gis //
NK072(nu)001:549: 'khor ba'i brtson rar bsdams pa'i nyams thag rnams //
NK072(nu)001:550: bde gshegs rnams kyi sras zhes brjod bya zhing //
NK072(nu)001:551: 'gro ba lha mir bcas pas phyag byar gyur //
NK072(nu)001:554: sbyor ba'i sngon du snying rje dang //
NK072(nu)001:555: mos pa dang ni bzod pa dang //
NK072(nu)001:556: dge la yang dag spyod pa ni //
NK072(nu)001:557: rigs kyi rtags su nges par bshad //
NK072(nu)001:559: don gnas lugs kyi dbang du byas na /
NK072(nu)001:561: thams cad ma lus chos so cog /
NK072(nu)001:562: sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin //
NK072(nu)001:565: nga yis 'di kun khyab pa ste //
NK072(nu)001:566: 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ma mthong //
NK072(nu)001:567: zhes sogs gsungs pas mtshon no //
NK072(nu)001:568: sems can gyi khams la gzigs pa 'jug pa'i tshul yang /
NK072(nu)001:569: sangs rgyas rang gi ngo bo chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi klong du gshegs pas /
NK072(nu)001:570: rang rig pa de nyid kyang shes rigs kyi chos
NK072(nu)001:571: kyi stong pas gdod ma nas 'od gsal ba'i phyir
NK072(nu)001:572: rang byung gi ye shes zhes bya zhing /
NK072(nu)001:573: de nyid yongs su dag pa'i zhing khams na sku
NK072(nu)001:574: dang ye shes kyi bkod pa sna tshogs par snang
NK072(nu)001:576: rang byung ye shes gnas med snang //
NK072(nu)001:578: snang lugs sems can nas gzhal na /
NK072(nu)001:579: 'gro ba rnams kyis log par rtog pas brtags pa'i
NK072(nu)001:580: sgrib pa de yang sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam par
NK072(nu)001:582: 'grel pa gsum gyi 'grel pas 'gro ba drug gi
NK072(nu)001:583: dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs
NK072(nu)001:584: pa'i byin rlabs zhing snang bar 'gyur te /
NK072(nu)001:586: log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing //
NK072(nu)001:587: ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir //
NK072(nu)001:588: thugs rje chen po'i 'brel bas na //
NK072(nu)001:589: 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang //
NK072(nu)001:592: dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bus sgyu ma'i skye bo
NK072(nu)001:593: mang po sgyu ma'i sdug bsngal gyi nang nas bton
NK072(nu)001:594: te / sgyu ma'i bde ba la bkod pa'i tshul /
NK072(nu)001:595: sgyu ma'i mig 'phrul la snang ba bzhin du sprul
NK072(nu)001:596: pa sgyu ma lta bus sems can sgyu ma lta
NK072(nu)001:597: bu rnams sgyu ma lta bu 'khor ba las bston
NK072(nu)001:598: nas / byang chub sgyu ma lta bu la 'god
NK072(nu)001:599: pa'i tshul sems can 'phrul pa'i blo la snang ste
NK072(nu)001:600: nas / / 'di ltar snang ba tsam la thugs rje chen pos sems can bsgral zhes bya ste /
NK072(nu)001:602: sems can sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste //
NK072(nu)001:603: byang chub kyang ni sgyu ma 'dra //
NK072(nu)001:604: dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gas //
NK072(nu)001:605: gyo mo la ni sngags bzlas te //
NK072(nu)001:606: legs par byas pa'i gzugs dag la //
NK072(nu)001:607: sbyor ba goms pas bsnun na ni //
NK072(nu)001:608: rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i gzugs //
NK072(nu)001:609: zhen pa'i sems la snang bar 'gyur //
NK072(nu)001:610: de bzhin bsod nams ye shes las //
NK072(nu)001:611: byung ba'i tshogs ni sgos pa'i sems //
NK072(nu)001:612: sems can rnams kyi bsams pa la //
NK072(nu)001:613: bla med byang chub snang bar byed //
NK072(nu)001:616: sngags kyi chu rgyun gyi tha mar //
NK072(nu)001:618: sgom pa tha ma thob nas ni //
NK072(nu)001:619: 'od zer chen po'i dbang bskur ro //
NK072(nu)001:621: mthar thug 'bras bu dbang bskur ba'i tshe /
NK072(nu)001:622: 'dod chags bde chen lam gyi yas 'bab dga' bzhi'i
NK072(nu)001:623: 'gros la thun mong gi sa bcu dang lam lnga
NK072(nu)001:624: / mas brtan dga' bzhi'i 'gros kyi khyad par gyi
NK072(nu)001:625: sa bcu dang lam lnga rdzogs nas 'tshang rgya tshul
NK072(nu)001:626: / gsungs pa / thun khyad kyi sa lam de'i
NK072(nu)001:627: gong du rdzogs tshul byung ba ji ltar yin zhes
NK072(nu)001:628: / gsungs pa / pa la / de yang /
NK072(nu)001:630: sa dang sa yi yon tan rnams //
NK072(nu)001:631: rtsa rnams kyi ni skye 'bri las //
NK072(nu)001:632: rlung dang ye shes las 'dod de //
NK072(nu)001:635: rnam bzhi'am gsum mam lnga 'khor lo //
NK072(nu)001:636: gnyis gnyis kyi ni gcig ma rdzogs //
NK072(nu)001:637: sa bcu tha mas ye shes pa //
NK072(nu)001:638: bzhi pas steng dang 'og tu grang //
NK072(nu)001:639: zhes pa'i don kun mkhyen chos rjes yid bzhin mdzod du /
NK072(nu)001:640: 'khor lo bzhi yi rlung sems las rung tshe //
NK072(nu)001:641: lam bzhi'i yon tan rim gyi 'char ba ste //
NK072(nu)001:642: dbu ma'i rtsa mdud gnyis gnyis grol ba las //
NK072(nu)001:643: sa bcu'i yon tan nang nas 'char bar bzhed //
NK072(nu)001:644: ces gsungs pa ltar lte snying mgrin pa spyi bo'i
NK072(nu)001:645: 'khor lo las su rung ba las tshogs sbyor mthong
NK072(nu)001:646: sgom gyi lam bzhi'i yon tan 'char zhing /
NK072(nu)001:647: dbu ma la ro rkyang gi mdud pa nyi shu gcig yod pa las /
NK072(nu)001:648: mdud pa gnyis gnyis grol ba na der dngas ma
NK072(nu)001:649: ye shes kyi rlung re re chud pas nyi shu'i
NK072(nu)001:651: tha ma nyer gcig pas grol bas sangs rgyas pa'i yon tan 'char bar bshad cing /
NK072(nu)001:652: de dag cung zad phye ste bshad na /
NK072(nu)001:653: lus lhar bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas sngags
NK072(nu)001:654: kyi tshogs lam du zhugs pa yin cing der brtan
NK072(nu)001:655: pa thob pa na lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo
NK072(nu)001:656: rlung sems rim gyis tshud de las su rung ba
NK072(nu)001:657: las tshogs lam che 'bring chung gsum gyi yon tan
NK072(nu)001:659: rtogs tshogs snang stong gnyis kyi lha'i dkyil 'khor du
NK072(nu)001:660: gsal ba la blo gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni
NK072(nu)001:661: mnga' zhing chos rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin thob pas
NK072(nu)001:662: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku las gdams ngag nyan nus
NK072(nu)001:663: pa ste / mdo sde rgyan las /
NK072(nu)001:664: de tshe chos kyi rgyun las ni /
NK072(nu)001:665: sangs rgyas rnams la zhi gnas dang //
NK072(nu)001:666: ye shes yangs pa thob bya'i phyir //
NK072(nu)001:667: gdam ngag rgya cher rnyed par gyur //
NK072(nu)001:670: de nas chos kyi 'khor lo'i rlung sems las su
NK072(nu)001:671: rung bas drod rtse gcig dang bzod pa chos mchog
NK072(nu)001:672: gnyis te sbyor lam gyi yon tan rnams 'char zhing
NK072(nu)001:673: / snang ba zung 'jug lha'i dkyil 'khor la sngags las gsal brtan du gyur pa yin /
NK072(nu)001:674: de nas longs spyod 'khor lo'i rlung sems las su
NK072(nu)001:675: rung tshe dbu ma'i mdud pa dang po gnyis grol
NK072(nu)001:676: bas chos nyid rang mtshan bskyed du byar med pa
NK072(nu)001:677: mthong / de 'phags pa'i sa dang po mthong lam
NK072(nu)001:678: gyi yon tan brgya phrag bcu gnyis 'char zhing longs
NK072(nu)001:679: spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la chos nyan nus /
NK072(nu)001:680: de nas spyi bo'i bde chen gyi 'khor lo'i rtsa
NK072(nu)001:681: mdud las su rung tshe dbu ma'i mdud pa gsum
NK072(nu)001:682: pa na nyi shu pa'i bar gnyis gnyis grol bas
NK072(nu)001:683: sgom lam sa dgu'i yon tan rnams rim gyis 'char
NK072(nu)001:684: / de yang sa gnyis pa dri ma med pa
NK072(nu)001:685: nas sa dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros kyi bar
NK072(nu)001:686: sa brgyad po thams cad ye shes sgyu ma'i sku
NK072(nu)001:687: can sgom lam phyag chen rig 'dzin dang /
NK072(nu)001:688: sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin ni sku lnga lhun
NK072(nu)001:689: grub rdo rje 'chang gi cha byad 'dzin pa mthar
NK072(nu)001:690: lam lhun grub rig 'dzin zhes bya'o //
NK072(nu)001:691: mkhas pa snga ma mang po'i bzhed par ting 'dzin
NK072(nu)001:692: gyi sa'i skabs su dus sbyor bcu gnyis 'gags pa'i
NK072(nu)001:693: dang po sbyor lam chos mchog /
NK072(nu)001:694: gnyis pa nas rim par 'phags pa'i slob lam sa
NK072(nu)001:695: bcu dang mi slob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa rnams
NK072(nu)001:697: ye shes kyi sku thob pa'i snga rol du dus
NK072(nu)001:698: sbyor bcu gnyis ma 'gags na ye shes kyi sku
NK072(nu)001:699: 'grub par mi 'gyur te tshe 'di'i phung po ma
NK072(nu)001:700: 'gags par bar do'i srid pa sgrub mi thub pa
NK072(nu)001:701: bzhin no // der ma zad yon tan gyi khyad
NK072(nu)001:702: par yang ting nge 'dzin gyi sa dang po thob
NK072(nu)001:703: nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi don
NK072(nu)001:705: sa gnyis pa nas gnyis sogs phyi ma phyi ma
NK072(nu)001:706: nyis 'gyur gyi grangs tshad bzung nas dus 'khor du
NK072(nu)001:707: gsungs pa ltar / de'i lugs kyi don mthong bcu
NK072(nu)001:708: pa thob na 'jig rten gyi khams lnga brgya dang
NK072(nu)001:709: bcu gnyis kyi don mthong ba las ma byung bas
NK072(nu)001:710: de ltar na mdo'i theg pa'i skabs su yang /
NK072(nu)001:711: 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i yon tan ni /
NK072(nu)001:713: re zhig bcu pa 'di yi yon tan dag /
NK072(nu)001:714: ngag gi spyod yul las ches 'das gyur cing //
NK072(nu)001:715: ngag gi spyod yul ma yin bsdoms rnams na //
NK072(nu)001:716: rdul dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed 'gyur //
NK072(nu)001:717: zhes mdo sde sa bcu pa'i don bsdus nas gsungs
NK072(nu)001:718: pa sogs mdo bstan bcos mang po dang 'gal ba'i
NK072(nu)001:719: skyon gnas / des na 'dir gsang sngags rang lam gyi sa lam sbyor tshul ni /
NK072(nu)001:720: bskyed rim rags pa dang phra ba la brtan pa
NK072(nu)001:721: thob na rim pas ye shes phebs pa dang ye
NK072(nu)001:722: shes chos dbang ba zhes dran pa nyer bzhag dang
NK072(nu)001:723: yang dag spong bas bsdus tshogs lam chung 'bring gi
NK072(nu)001:724: yon tan rdzogs / bskyed rim klungs su phebs nas
NK072(nu)001:725: rdzogs rim gyi gsal snang rgyud la skyes tshe rdzu
NK072(nu)001:726: 'phrul rkang bzhi'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid tshogs lam
NK072(nu)001:727: yon tan rdzogs / chen po thob / rgyu'i rdzogs
NK072(nu)001:728: rim la goms pas dbang po lnga'i yon tan rang
NK072(nu)001:730: de nyid brtan pas rtse mo dang /
NK072(nu)001:731: bzod pa rnams thob ste nang du yas 'bab dga'
NK072(nu)001:732: bzhi'i sas bsdus pa'i zhu bde las byung ba ste
NK072(nu)001:733: / ting nge 'dzin gyi sa bcu gcig pa man chad kyi yon tan rdzogs pa'o //
NK072(nu)001:734: ting nge 'dzin gyi sa bcu gnyis pa'i skad cig ma stong bdun brgya go dgu ni /
NK072(nu)001:735: sbyor lam chos mchog yin te /
NK072(nu)001:736: de nyid mas brtan dga' bzhis bsdus pa stobs lnga'i
NK072(nu)001:737: rang bzhin ye shes kyi sku nam mkha' mdzod thob
NK072(nu)001:738: pa'o // sa bcu gnyis pa'i skad cig tha ma
NK072(nu)001:739: rdzogs pa'i dus der thams cad stong pa'i ye shes
NK072(nu)001:740: shin tu rnam par dag pa don gyi rdzogs rim
NK072(nu)001:741: gyi 'od gsal thob pas byang chub yan lag mthong
NK072(nu)001:742: pa'o // ba'i lam ste / rnam pa dag pa'i rang bzhin bden pa bcu drug go //
NK072(nu)001:743: de'i tshe sngar phra yang gi lus thob ma thob gang yin yang rung ste /
NK072(nu)001:744: rang gi snang ngor sgyu lus rlung sems tsam gyi lha sku snang ba'am nub cing /
NK072(nu)001:745: zung 'jug gi sku yang ma thob pas /
NK072(nu)001:746: ye shes 'od gsal rkyang pa'i sku zhes 'dogs te /
NK072(nu)001:747: 'phags pa'i mthong lam bde stong de kho na la mnyam par bzhag pa'i 'od gsal yin la /
NK072(nu)001:748: de'i dus su 'khor ba'i lus ngag yid gsum dang chags rtog rnams spangs zin /
NK072(nu)001:749: de rjes 'od gsal de las langs tshe chos nyid
NK072(nu)001:750: mngon sum du rtogs pa'i bde chen sa dang ye
NK072(nu)001:751: shes kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'byams gnyis ngo bo dbyer
NK072(nu)001:752: med du grub pa'i zung 'jug de rgyun mi chad
NK072(nu)001:753: par mnyam rjes thams cad du 'byung ba zung 'jug
NK072(nu)001:754: rig pa 'dzin pa'i ye shes kyi sku grub pa'i
NK072(nu)001:755: phyir / de ni 'dod gzugs kyi rig pa 'dzin
NK072(nu)001:756: pa dang lam mchog yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshe dbang
NK072(nu)001:757: sogs las khyad par du 'phags pas slob lam gyi
NK072(nu)001:758: phyir / mchog gam / gtso bor gyur pa sku
NK072(nu)001:759: gsung thugs ye shes rdo rje'i gral du tshud pas
NK072(nu)001:760: rdo rje bzhi dbyer mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi
NK072(nu)001:762: 'di ni 'phags lam yan lag brgyad kyi rang bzhin
NK072(nu)001:763: sgom pa'i lam gyis dgu de man chad du lam
NK072(nu)001:765: sa bcu rgyun tha nas lam 'di 'dra kho nas
NK072(nu)001:766: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sar bgrod mchog pa'i phyir
NK072(nu)001:767: dang / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang rnam pa mtshungs pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:771: rdo rje sems dpa' sogs kyi mtshan yang gsol lo //
NK072(nu)001:772: sa bcu rgyun tha 'dir lus ngag yid gsum dang
NK072(nu)001:773: 'dzag bde'i gnyis snang bskyed pa'i chos rten khu rdul
NK072(nu)001:774: rlung gsum dang / de gsum dang ro gcig tu
NK072(nu)001:775: 'dres pa'i brtan pa sems rnams rags pa bem chos
NK072(nu)001:777: phra ba rnam par shes pas tsam du rig pa
NK072(nu)001:778: yod pa'i phyir gnyis snang phra mo'ang ma 'gags pas
NK072(nu)001:779: de sbyong byed sa bcu rgyun gyi mtha' mar 'dod
NK072(nu)001:780: chags chen po'i lam gyi dbang skur bas sa lam
NK072(nu)001:781: rdzogs tshul gcig byung ba ni /
NK072(nu)001:782: sngar gyi sa lam rnams kyis sems nyid kyi yon tan ril po yongs su rdzogs ma thub pas /
NK072(nu)001:783: bde chen gyi ye shes de yang 'gyur bcas kyi na 'phar ba yin la /
NK072(nu)001:784: 'dir mi 'gyur ba'i bde chen gyi ye shes mthar
NK072(nu)001:785: phyin pa'i 'gros la sa lam rdzogs tshul du bzhag
NK072(nu)001:786: ste / de yang mngon par byang chub pa chen
NK072(nu)001:787: po khu rdul rlung gsum gyi bag chags phra mo
NK072(nu)001:788: lhag med du 'gags pas 'dzag bde'i bag chags kyang
NK072(nu)001:789: gtan nas spangs te sku gsung thugs ye shes rdo
NK072(nu)001:790: rje dbyer mi phyed pa sku bzhi'i bdag nyid can
NK072(nu)001:792: de yang snying stobs zhu ba dag pas mtshan dpe
NK072(nu)001:793: rdzogs shing kha sbyor gyi sku zhing dang mchod par
NK072(nu)001:794: bcas pa byung ba sku rdo rje /
NK072(nu)001:795: rdul te dmar cha dag pas bde chen nyid gzhom
NK072(nu)001:796: med kyi gsung rnam par thams cad par 'char ba
NK072(nu)001:797: gsung rdo rje / mun pa ste rlung dag pas
NK072(nu)001:798: bde ba chen po'i ye shes de kho na rnam
NK072(nu)001:799: par mi rtog bzhin du ji lta ji snyed kyi
NK072(nu)001:800: chos thams cad mkhyen pa thugs rdo rje /
NK072(nu)001:801: 'gyur bde myong ba'i shes pa'i rigs rgyun dag pas
NK072(nu)001:802: sems nyid mi 'gyur ba'i bde chen du gyur pa
NK072(nu)001:803: ni bde ba chen po'i sku ye shes rdo rje'o
NK072(nu)001:804: // de'i tshe sbrel gyi ye shes rang bzhin rnam
NK072(nu)001:805: dag mngon du gyur pa'i cha chos kyi sku rnam
NK072(nu)001:807: de glo bur rnam dag mthar thug pas khyad par
NK072(nu)001:808: du byas pa rlung dbu mar thim pa'i sgra dbyangs
NK072(nu)001:809: gsung chos sgo sna tshogs par 'char ba longs sku
NK072(nu)001:810: dang / bde chen gyi thig le 'gyur med ni ngo bo sku yin la /
NK072(nu)001:811: de sems can thams cad la khyab cing spros pa'i
NK072(nu)001:812: tshul gyi gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa'i
NK072(nu)001:813: thugs rje ni gang 'dul gyi sprul sku mtha' med
NK072(nu)001:815: de yang rdul gyi dwangs ma gtsug tor nas nor
NK072(nu)001:816: bu bar cha bcu gnyis su brtan nas bden rnam
NK072(nu)001:818: dkar cha'i dwangs ma nor bu nas spyi bo'i bar
NK072(nu)001:819: dga' ba bcu drug gi rim pas brtan pa'i phyir
NK072(nu)001:820: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug zung du 'jug pa'i
NK072(nu)001:822: thun mong pa mdo sde las byung ba zag med kyi yon tan sde tshan nyer gcig sogs dang /
NK072(nu)001:823: thun mong ma yin pa kha sbyor yan lag bdun ldan la sogs pa mnga' zhing /
NK072(nu)001:824: ye shes rgya mtsho zad mi shes pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:825: phrin las nam mkha' dang mnyam pa rgya che rgyun
NK072(nu)001:826: chad med par lhun grub pa'i bdag nyid mngon du
NK072(nu)001:827: gyur pa'i mthar thug pa na mi slob pa'i zung
NK072(nu)001:828: 'jug yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go
NK072(nu)001:829: 'phang thob pa'o // dri ba lnga pa dbang bskur
NK072(nu)001:830: gyi lha dang byin rlabs kyi lha gnyis ka rigs
NK072(nu)001:831: lnga yin par bshad pa las /
NK072(nu)001:833: byin rlabs sku gsung thugs gsum gyi brlabs pa las
NK072(nu)001:834: yon tan phrin las gnyis kyi rlobs pa mi mdzad
NK072(nu)001:837: yon tan phrin las kyi lha de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:838: khyod lte ba'i g.yas g.yon du zla ba s+w+aa sngon
NK072(nu)001:839: po dang h+aa ljang gu'i rnam par rgyas btab ste
NK072(nu)001:840: byin gyis rlobs mi dgos par thal /
NK072(nu)001:841: byin rlabs kyi lha rdo rje gsum gyi lha de yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:845: dgos pa'i rgyu mtshan rgyud na byin rlabs kyi sngags ma h+aa k+aa ya nas /
NK072(nu)001:846: ma h+aa p+au dza badz+ra kyi bar sngags lnga bshad pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:847: 'grel bar spyi bor dung khang du zla ba dkar po /
NK072(nu)001:848: mgrin par pad+ma la am dmar po /
NK072(nu)001:849: thugs kar tsit+ta'i mdun du nyi ma la h'u sngon po /
NK072(nu)001:850: lte ba'i g.yas g.yon du zla ba la s+w+aa sngon
NK072(nu)001:851: po dang h+aa ljang gu'i yi ge lnga yongs su
NK072(nu)001:852: gyur pa las rdo rje lnga'i lha lngas rgyas btab
NK072(nu)001:855: gnas gsum khyab 'jug yi ge las //
NK072(nu)001:857: khams gsum byin rlabs gzi byin bsdu //
NK072(nu)001:858: rang bzhin rdo rje gsum gnas pa //
NK072(nu)001:859: rgyu gnyis tshul gyi rang snang ba'o //
NK072(nu)001:860: lte ba rnam gnyis zla ba la //
NK072(nu)001:861: sngo ljang yi ge s+w+aa h+aa gnyis //
NK072(nu)001:862: rjes mthun 'od kyi yon tan la //
NK072(nu)001:863: yan lag rdzogs pa'i gzi byin ldan //
NK072(nu)001:865: yang rigs lnga kas byin gyis rlobs dgos zer /
NK072(nu)001:867: dbang lha lnga gcig tu khas len par thal /
NK072(nu)001:868: sku rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:869: mi bskyod pa gcig pa gang zhig /
NK072(nu)001:870: phrin las rdo rje don grub dang /
NK072(nu)001:871: don grub gcig pa'i phyir 'dod na /
NK072(nu)001:872: dbang lha lnga po de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:873: khyod tshogs brgyad ye shes lngar dag pa'i rtags kyi
NK072(nu)001:874: rigs lnga dbu rgyan bcings pa ma yin par thal
NK072(nu)001:875: / khyod lha thams cad la rgyas 'debs pa'i khyab byed rdo rje lnga'i lha yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:880: phung lnga rigs lngar dag pa'i rtags kyi khyab bya'i lha yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:882: byin lha dang dbang lha gnyis sku'i cha lugs kyang gcig tu yod par thal /
NK072(nu)001:883: gnyis ka rigs lnga'i lha yin pa la mtshungs pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:886: byin lha ni rigs lnga longs sku'i cha lugs 'dzin pa nges par dgos te /
NK072(nu)001:887: sprul sku las longs sku rgya che ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:888: sprul sku'i sprul gzhi yang longs sku yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK072(nu)001:889: dbang lha ni cha lugs rigs lnga sprul sku'i cha lugs su yod de /
NK072(nu)001:890: gzhi gdod ma'i lha'i yon tan gyi cha shas ye
NK072(nu)001:891: shes lnga'i rtags kyi cod pan rigs lngas dbu brgyan
NK072(nu)001:893: yang rtsa lha mi bskyod pas byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo mi bskyod pa de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:894: khyod kyi snying khar rang 'dra'i mi bskyod pa gcig dang /
NK072(nu)001:895: byin rlabs kyi lha mi bskyod pa gnyis /
NK072(nu)001:896: sgom pa tshe chad ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:897: mi skyod pa la mi bskyod pas byin gyis rlabs pa thug med yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:898: yang ston pa kun bzang chos can /
NK072(nu)001:899: khyed rigs thams cad kyi bdag po ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:900: khyod la sku gsung thugs kyi lha sa byin gyis rlobs dgos pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:903: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid //
NK072(nu)001:906: ston pa kun bzang chos can /
NK072(nu)001:907: khyod la rigs lngas dbang bskur mi dgos par thal /
NK072(nu)001:908: khyod rigs drug pa'i bdag nyid can du gnas pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:911: mi bskyod byed po yum dang bcas //
NK072(nu)001:912: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyar bstan //
NK072(nu)001:913: byams pa sa snying de bzhin te //
NK072(nu)001:914: gzhan dag rang rang phyag rgyar ldan //
NK072(nu)001:915: gshin rje gshed la rtag par bshad //
NK072(nu)001:916: thub chen rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa //
NK072(nu)001:917: zla dang bral ba'i dpa' bo che //
NK072(nu)001:920: khyod sprul pa ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:921: khyod la dbang bskur byin rlabs dgos pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:923: dbang skur byin rlabs dgos par thal /
NK072(nu)001:926: thub drug sprul rang sprul pa rang byung phyir /
NK072(nu)001:927: byin rlabs dbang bskur ma gsungs so //
NK072(nu)001:928: zhes bshad pa mi 'thad par thal /
NK072(nu)001:929: de ltar dgos pa'i phyir yang rnal lan 'od rim
NK072(nu)001:930: gyis lung don zla dang bral ba'i dpa' bo che
NK072(nu)001:931: // zhes gsung pas 'khrul gzhi byas par mngon no //
NK072(nu)001:932: dbang bskur gyi skabs dbang bskur ba po'i slob dpon yin na /
NK072(nu)001:933: nges par bdag 'jug len dgos pa'i khyab par thal /
NK072(nu)001:934: 'jug pa'i chos de la slob dpon 'jug pa'i chos gnyis dang /
NK072(nu)001:935: slob ma 'jug pa'i chos bcu drug bshad pa'i slob dpon 'jug pa'i chos gnyis po de /
NK072(nu)001:936: dkyil 'khor bzhengs sgrub kyi las rab 'byams dang /
NK072(nu)001:937: rig pa'i me tog dor ba la sogs pa'i sgo
NK072(nu)001:938: nas rang nyid dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas slob ma
NK072(nu)001:939: dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa'i snang ba chos gnyis po
NK072(nu)001:942: ston pa kun bzang chos can /
NK072(nu)001:945: 'dod mi nus te ha cang thal ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:946: yang mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sngags kyi rdo rje
NK072(nu)001:947: slob dpon tshogs lam pa lta bu zhig yin na
NK072(nu)001:948: / nges par bdag 'jug len dgos par thal /
NK072(nu)001:949: de ltar dgos pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:951: kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug /
NK072(nu)001:952: de nas slob ma 'jug par bya //
NK072(nu)001:955: gsang sngags pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de gang zhe na /
NK072(nu)001:956: 'di ltar snang grags kyi bsdus pa'i snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang dang /
NK072(nu)001:959: dran rtog chos nyid du shes pa de mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i gsang sngags pa yin pas /
NK072(nu)001:960: de 'dra'i 'phags lam ma thob pa'i sngags pa de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:961: khyod kyi slob ma la dbang bskur tshe /
NK072(nu)001:962: nges par bdag 'jug len dgos par thal /
NK072(nu)001:963: khyod dbang bskur ba po'i rdo rje slob dpon yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:966: khyed bskyed rdzogs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes
NK072(nu)001:967: kyi snang ba la gnas pa'i gang zag ma yin
NK072(nu)001:968: par thal / dgongs pa de las lhag pa'i bdag 'jug len rgyu yod pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:969: 'dod na de ltar yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:970: snang grags lha sngags ye shes kyi dbang don la gnas pa'i gang zag yin pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:972: ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can //
NK072(nu)001:973: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs //
NK072(nu)001:975: ye shes rngams pa glog gi 'khor lo las /
NK072(nu)001:976: sems kyi chos la dbang thob na //
NK072(nu)001:977: rdzas tshig mtshan ma'i dbang rnams kun //
NK072(nu)001:978: ma bskur bar yang thob par 'gyur //
NK072(nu)001:980: deng sang phyag len la bdag 'jug nges par len pa /
NK072(nu)001:981: dbang blangs pas dbang gi chu bo ma nyams pa
NK072(nu)001:982: de gong 'phel du song nas dngos grub thob pa'i
NK072(nu)001:984: dbang bskur ba'i sngon du bdag 'jug len pa bla
NK072(nu)001:985: ma rang gi ma tshor ba'i dam tshig nyams pa
NK072(nu)001:986: srid pa de gso ba'i ched yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:987: yang rdo rje rgyal tshab pas dbang rdzas thogs nas
NK072(nu)001:988: dbang bskur ba'i tshe rgyal tshab las dbang thob pa
NK072(nu)001:989: yin par thal / des dbang bskur ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:991: rdo rje rgyal tshab chos can /
NK072(nu)001:992: khyod dbang gis rgyud par 'jug dgos par thal /
NK072(nu)001:993: khyed dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:994: 'dod na rdo rje rgyal tshab pa chos can /
NK072(nu)001:995: khyed kyi dbang rdzas kyi bya ba byas tshe rdo
NK072(nu)001:996: rje slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dgos pas
NK072(nu)001:997: dbang thob pa ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:998: khyod las dbang thob pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1000: dper na pho nyas rgyal po'i lung dang bka' rtags khyer te 'bangs kyi tshogs la bsgrags pa na /
NK072(nu)001:1001: pho nya'i ngag de rgyal po'i ngag tu 'dzin pa dang chos mtshungs pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1002: de tsam gyi rgyal tshab dbang rgyud la 'jug dgos na /
NK072(nu)001:1003: gsang dbang dang shes dbang gnyis kyi rig cha de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1004: khyod gnyis dbang gi brgyud par 'jug par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1005: khyed gnyis kyi byed las la brten nas gsang dbang dang sher dbang gnyis thob pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:1006: bde ba myu gu'i rgyud las /
NK072(nu)001:1007: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas kyis //
NK072(nu)001:1008: mkha' mnyam ye shes bdud rtsi ni //
NK072(nu)001:1009: rdo rje'i lam nas rab bsdus nas //
NK072(nu)001:1010: bde ba bskyed byed rigs kyi yum //
NK072(nu)001:1011: sras rnams gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas //
NK072(nu)001:1012: rdo rje'i bla ma gnyis pa'o //
NK072(nu)001:1015: lhan cig skyes pa bde bral ba //
NK072(nu)001:1016: nam mkha' dang ni mnyam par sbyor //
NK072(nu)001:1017: rigs mnyam dpe med bde ster ma //
NK072(nu)001:1018: sring mo de nyid bla mar basngagasa //
NK072(nu)001:1020: dri ba lnga pa le'u bzhi pa la /
NK072(nu)001:1021: 'phros don zhig bkod nas de'i khongs nas rtogs par bya'o //
NK072(nu)001:1022: de la phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yis sogs nas yi ge mgo nas k+aa la rdzogs /
NK072(nu)001:1025: dbyings las a byung a las ni //
NK072(nu)001:1026: yi ge'i tshogs rnams ma lus 'phro //
NK072(nu)001:1027: zhes ba'i gzhung 'di la 'phros par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1028: rgyu mtshan phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de rgyal ba thams
NK072(nu)001:1029: cad kyi chos sku'i rol pa gzugs sku'i dkyil 'khor
NK072(nu)001:1030: ji snyed pa thams cad mtshon byed kyi rtsa ba
NK072(nu)001:1031: yi ge bzhi cu rtsa lnga'i rnam bzhag de bstan
NK072(nu)001:1032: nas / yi ge de nyid ji ltar byung ba'i tshul de ston par byed pa la /
NK072(nu)001:1033: dbyings las a byung zhes sogs kyi gzhung 'di byung ba gang zhig /
NK072(nu)001:1034: de ltar sku gsung thugs kyi klong las a skye
NK072(nu)001:1035: ba med pa byung ba'i a yig de'i 'od zer
NK072(nu)001:1036: sku'i gnas so sor 'khyil ba de dang de las
NK072(nu)001:1037: yi ge gzhan rnams byung ba yin no //
NK072(nu)001:1038: zhes ston par byed pa la /
NK072(nu)001:1040: a las 'od zer mgul gyi bum par 'khyil //
NK072(nu)001:1041: 'od 'phros ka la sogs pa 'bru lnga shar //
NK072(nu)001:1042: zhes pa 'di byung ba'i phyir de ltar 'phros pa 'dod na /
NK072(nu)001:1043: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1044: khyod ston pa'i sku'i gnas de dag las byung ba ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1045: khyod 'byung ba'i gnas gzhan yod pa'i phyir ma grub na /
NK072(nu)001:1048: khog pa mgrin pa rkan dang lce //
NK072(nu)001:1049: sna dang spyi bo so dang mchu //
NK072(nu)001:1051: yang 'bru lngar shar ba'i yi ge de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1052: khyod ngos 'dzin mi rig par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1053: re re nas bgrang du med pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1054: rang lugs 'dren pa ka sde dang /
NK072(nu)001:1056: yang gong du sku'i gnas las ma byung zer na /
NK072(nu)001:1058: khyed kyi sku'i gnas las byung bar thal /
NK072(nu)001:1059: khyod kyi sku'i gnas nyi shu las byung ba'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:1061: byin pa sta zur sku skabs dang //
NK072(nu)001:1062: dpung las ya ra wa la byung //
NK072(nu)001:1063: phyag mthil thugs ka mdzod spu dang //
NK072(nu)001:1064: zhabs mthil gsang gnas las rim bzhin //
NK072(nu)001:1065: sha b+ha pa h+aa k+sha rnams 'phros //
NK072(nu)001:1066: spyan snyan tshems shangs rnam bzhi las //
NK072(nu)001:1069: spyi gtsug 'tshog ma lte ba yis //
NK072(nu)001:1070: gnas las mgo shad rig gsum thon //
NK072(nu)001:1072: 'o na spyir btang yi ge lnga bcu tham pa
NK072(nu)001:1073: la 'dir bzhi bcu rtsa lnga las ma byung bas
NK072(nu)001:1074: yi ge yongs rdzogs ma tshangs ba'i skyon gnas so
NK072(nu)001:1076: a ring po shad du bsdus ahrnama bcad tsheg tu bsdus /
NK072(nu)001:1077: am sna dang ldan pa e la sbyar nas du bsdus /
NK072(nu)001:1078: ma ning gi yi ge bzhi po ra dang lar bsdus pa'o //
NK072(nu)001:1080: mgo ni ma nor lam yin pas //
NK072(nu)001:1082: yi ge lam de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1083: khyod yi ge'i mgo yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1084: de las gzhan pa'i smra rgyu gzhan med pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1087: khyod ber ga ris la bshad pa mi 'thad par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1088: lam yig de yi ge'i mgo yin pa'i phyir //
NK072(nu)001:1090: dpal sbyin gyis zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK072(nu)001:1091: mgo ni thog mar mtshon pa ste //
NK072(nu)001:1092: dngas la gzugs su gang gnas pas //
NK072(nu)001:1093: de ni yi ge'i mgo yin te //
NK072(nu)001:1094: ber ka ris la mgo zhes bya //
NK072(nu)001:1096: yang ber ka ri dang lam gnyis gcig go //
NK072(nu)001:1098: 'o na yi ge lam de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1099: khyod glang po che'i sna 'dra bar yod par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1101: mgo ni i glang po'i sna 'dra bar /
NK072(nu)001:1102: shad de a ring po mda' lta bu /
NK072(nu)001:1104: dbang phyug chen po'i mig lta bu zhes bshad pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1105: gzhan yang de ltar ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1106: yi ge'i thig de mgo yin par khas len rigs pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1107: ma grub na thig de chos can khyod yi ge'i mgo yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1108: de yin tshul ston par byed pa ni /
NK072(nu)001:1109: gzugs can snying pos zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK072(nu)001:1110: yi ge'i mgo ni thig yin pas //
NK072(nu)001:1111: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rnams //
NK072(nu)001:1112: ma nor dam pa'i thig yin pas //
NK072(nu)001:1113: lam mkhan thig nas yi ger zhugs //
NK072(nu)001:1116: tig ni shes rab ming du smra //
NK072(nu)001:1117: yi ge tig de shes rab kyi ming yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1120: yi ge tig de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1121: khyod shes rab kyi ming yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1124: yi ge tig de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1125: khyod shes rab kyi ming ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1126: tsheg la tig ces bshad pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:1127: yo ga rgyan dam pa las /
NK072(nu)001:1128: bsdud pa'i phyir na tsheg ni tig /
NK072(nu)001:1129: 'thor ba bsdus nas ming du smra //
NK072(nu)001:1131: khyim bdag drag shul can gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /
NK072(nu)001:1132: tig ni tsheg tu sgrub pa ste //
NK072(nu)001:1133: yi ge bsdus nas ming du smra //
NK072(nu)001:1134: de phyir tsheg ni tig ces bya //
NK072(nu)001:1136: shad ni tshigs su bcad pa'i yi ge ste /
NK072(nu)001:1138: gcod pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming dbyug pa zhes bla dwags su gtags so //
NK072(nu)001:1140: dpal sbyin gyis zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK072(nu)001:1141: tshigs su bcad pa'i las can la //
NK072(nu)001:1142: de phyir bshad du grags so zhes //
NK072(nu)001:1144: gzhan yang sems kyi rang bzhin chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1145: khyod yi ge rnam par gnas par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1146: khyod yi ge a'i rnam par gnas pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1148: yi ge'i rnam par gnas pa ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1149: ming tshig yi ge la 'das pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1152: khyod skye med mtshon byed kyi yi ge ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1153: khyod mtshon bya skye med kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1157: a ni stong dang mi stong gi //
NK072(nu)001:1158: dbu ma'ang dmigs su yod ma yin //
NK072(nu)001:1160: gang skye ba med pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi
NK072(nu)001:1161: ge la ni a zhes pa'i ming bla dwags su
NK072(nu)001:1163: gzhan yang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su snang ba'i phyag rgya'i lha de dang /
NK072(nu)001:1164: yi ge'i phyag rgyar snang ba'i lha bzhi bcu rtsa
NK072(nu)001:1165: gnyis po gcig tu khas len mi rigs par thal
NK072(nu)001:1168: thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun //
NK072(nu)001:1169: yi ge 'phreng ba nyid la gnas //
NK072(nu)001:1171: de dag gi rnal lan ni /
NK072(nu)001:1172: mgo ni ma nor lam zhes pa'i don /
NK072(nu)001:1173: gzugs dbyibs don ma yin yi ge thams cad kyi
NK072(nu)001:1174: mgo 'dren cing 'jug pa'i sgor gyur pas lam dang
NK072(nu)001:1175: 'dra ba yin pa'i don dang thig yin pa'i don
NK072(nu)001:1176: yang / brjod bya'i don yang dag pa drang por
NK072(nu)001:1177: mtshon byed thig yin par yang bshad pas thig dang
NK072(nu)001:1178: lam don gcig par bshad pa ste /
NK072(nu)001:1179: gzugs can snying pos zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK072(nu)001:1180: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lam //
NK072(nu)001:1181: ma nor dam pa thig yin pas //
NK072(nu)001:1182: rkang lam mthil nas yi ger zhugs //
NK072(nu)001:1183: yi ge mgo ni thig ces bya //
NK072(nu)001:1186: skye med mtshon byed a'i yan lag gi dang po dbyings ber ka ris la bshad do //
NK072(nu)001:1187: yi ge thams cad mtshon byed kyi lha yin pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:1188: phyag rgya'i lha de yang mtshon byed kyi lha yin te /
NK072(nu)001:1189: chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi lha de zhal phyag las 'das mod kyang /
NK072(nu)001:1190: chos nyid kyi yon tan zhal phyag dang mtshan mas mtshon nas rtogs dgos pa'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)001:1191: yi ge'i don dper na rdul 'dus pa ni gong bu yin la /
NK072(nu)001:1192: de bas na rdul phran ni gong bu 'dzin pa'i gnas yin pa bzhin du /
NK072(nu)001:1193: ming gi mthar thug gi ni ming gi mtha'i yi ge yin la /
NK072(nu)001:1194: ming mtha'i yi ge 'dus pa las dbyangs yig gcig gis bcings pa'i yi ge 'grub bo //
NK072(nu)001:1195: de 'dus pa las ka ba dang bum pa sogs dngos po rnams kyi ming 'grub /
NK072(nu)001:1196: de grub pas tshig gi tshogs ma lus pa 'grub pa ste /
NK072(nu)001:1197: de'i phyir yi ge ni tshig ma lus pa 'dzin pa'i gnas so //
NK072(nu)001:1198: yi ge rang bzhin sems nyid spros pa dang bral ba yin mod kyang /
NK072(nu)001:1199: 'phrul pa tsam dbyibs dang kha dog dang ming gi
NK072(nu)001:1200: sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa sgrub par byed
NK072(nu)001:1202: dngos med yi ge'i rang bzhin sems //
NK072(nu)001:1203: bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang //
NK072(nu)001:1204: dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs las //
NK072(nu)001:1205: rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston //
NK072(nu)001:1207: de yang yi ge nyid lha yin pa'i tshul ni /
NK072(nu)001:1210: sku gsung thugs kyi phreng ba bsdus //
NK072(nu)001:1212: 'bras bu rgyal ba smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis /
NK072(nu)001:1214: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge'i 'khor lor gyur te /
NK072(nu)001:1216: dri ba drug pa le'u bco lnga pa'i skor la /
NK072(nu)001:1217: 'phros don zhig smos nas brjod par bya ste /
NK072(nu)001:1218: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i rdo rje bkod pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
NK072(nu)001:1219: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs cha'i srid pa gsum gyi
NK072(nu)001:1220: bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen po'i gzi brjid
NK072(nu)001:1221: ston pa'i phyir / zhes sogs kyi gzhung 'di /
NK072(nu)001:1222: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
NK072(nu)001:1223: po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
NK072(nu)001:1225: zhes pa'i gzhung 'di las 'phros par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1226: rgyu mtshan rigs drug pa kun tu bzang po de
NK072(nu)001:1227: nyid gdul bya gdug pa can rnams kyi snang ngor
NK072(nu)001:1228: sngon byung khro bo'i gleng gzhi ston pa phun sum
NK072(nu)001:1229: tshogs pa'i rnam dag de bstan nas /
NK072(nu)001:1230: rmad du byung ba'i chos phun sum tshogs pa pho rnams bsgral ba'i las kyi 'dul ba dang /
NK072(nu)001:1231: mo rnams sbyor ba'i las kyi 'dul ba'i phrin las
NK072(nu)001:1232: phun sum tshogs pa nges par ston par byed pa
NK072(nu)001:1233: ni / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i zhes sogs kyi gzhung de byung ba gang zhig /
NK072(nu)001:1234: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa de la gdul bya gdug pa can gyi 'khor dang /
NK072(nu)001:1235: 'dul byed gnyen po'i 'khor gnyis yod pa las /
NK072(nu)001:1236: dang po de ston par byed pa ni /
NK072(nu)001:1238: bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pa dang //
NK072(nu)001:1240: gnyis pa de ston par byed pa ni la la
NK072(nu)001:1241: ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rjer gyur te
NK072(nu)001:1243: zhes sogs gzhung 'di byung ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1245: ru tra de sngon bskal pa kun bkod kyi dus su dge slong thub dka' gzhon nu bsten nas /
NK072(nu)001:1246: ci bzhin nyid de ma bcos na //
NK072(nu)001:1247: dngos po bzhi la gnas spyad kyang //
NK072(nu)001:1248: nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin du //
NK072(nu)001:1250: zhes pa sgra ci bzhin par spyad pas gol te las kyi ru trar skyes par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1251: lta ba'i gnas lugs ma rtogs par de ltar spyad pas gol ba'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:1253: ma rtogs pa yi spyad gyur na //
NK072(nu)001:1254: yi dwags srin po'i gnas su skye //
NK072(nu)001:1256: khyod kyi gab pa'i gsang ba lta ba gnas lugs de bzhin nyid ma rtogs par /
NK072(nu)001:1257: sbas pa gsang ba spyod pa sbyor sgrol byol nyog
NK072(nu)001:1258: tu spyad pa'i rnam smin gyi 'bras bu dmyal ba
NK072(nu)001:1259: dang yi dwags su skyes nas bskal pa chen po
NK072(nu)001:1260: stong phrag bcu gnyis dang bskal chen drug gi bar
NK072(nu)001:1261: du dmyal ba tsha grang dang yi dwags bkres skom
NK072(nu)001:1262: gyi sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar thal /
NK072(nu)001:1263: de ltar gzhung las bshad pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1264: de ltar bshad pa tshul bstan yin gyi dngos su ma myong zer na /
NK072(nu)001:1265: 'o na ru tra thar pa nag po de sngon gyi dus su gsang sngags rang gar spyad de /
NK072(nu)001:1266: khro bo dang phra men la sogs pa'i lha rang rgyud du bsgoms /
NK072(nu)001:1267: ra la ra la sogs pa'i sngags rang gar bzlas /
NK072(nu)001:1268: pho bsgral mo sbyor gyi las rlang por spyad pa'i srid pas mtshams sbyar nas /
NK072(nu)001:1269: yul lang+ka pu rang gi smad tshong ma'i mngal du chags pa las /
NK072(nu)001:1270: mngal nas skyes nas zhag bdun lon pa dang ma
NK072(nu)001:1271: de shi bas yul mi rnams kyis bu de ma'i
NK072(nu)001:1272: ro'i mchan du bcug nas dug shing nal ba'i rtsar
NK072(nu)001:1273: skyal bas / bu des ma'i nu zho dang sha
NK072(nu)001:1274: dang khrag dang rus pa'i bar du zos pas kho
NK072(nu)001:1275: cher bltas nas dur khrod kyi ro rnams zas su
NK072(nu)001:1276: za zhing ro gos rnams gos su gyon pas yi
NK072(nu)001:1277: dwags 'gro bas bsdus pa'i lus dang yan lag mi
NK072(nu)001:1278: mtshams par mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa /
NK072(nu)001:1279: gsod byed kyi 'khor dred mo lag bsdebs dang /
NK072(nu)001:1281: bya spyang gsod byed la sogs pa'i 'khor dang ldan
NK072(nu)001:1282: zhing bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad btang ba'i srin po
NK072(nu)001:1283: bya'i gshog pa can yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1284: de ltar yin tshul gzhung las bshad pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1287: de nas sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mod kyang de khad kyis bsrabs pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:1289: de dag thams cad sprul bshad yin zin na /
NK072(nu)001:1291: 'di dang cha 'dra ba'i ru tra rang rgyud gcig khas len rigs par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1293: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi tshul du bstan pa rig pa bya ste /
NK072(nu)001:1294: de la dgos pa dang dgongs pa ci yod ce na /
NK072(nu)001:1295: rang rgyud pa'i gol sa dgag pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:1296: che ba'i mthu'i tshad bstan pa'i dgos pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:1299: ru tra rang rgyud pa de dmyal ba dang yi dwags kyi las myong stobs kyi zad par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1300: de nas rnam par smin pa de khad kyis srab pa dang zhes bshad pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1302: rnam smin spyad pas zad dam /
NK072(nu)001:1305: yang dag pa'i lam dgos med du thal /
NK072(nu)001:1306: rnam smin spyad pas zad pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1309: thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyi //
NK072(nu)001:1310: rang byung kun bzang lhun gyi grub //
NK072(nu)001:1312: gnyen po brten pas zad na /
NK072(nu)001:1313: ngan song gsum mi khom pa'i gnas ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1314: gnyen po brten du 'dug pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1315: gzhan yang dpal chen pos ru tra dngos su bsgral ba yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1316: 'dir bshad pa ni sprul pa ba yin cing /
NK072(nu)001:1317: gzhan gang du ru tra dngos su ma bshad pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1320: ma tram ru tra bsgral ba'i rdzas brgyad las //
NK072(nu)001:1321: gsang sngags 'byon pa'i gnas brgyad byin gyis rlobs //
NK072(nu)001:1324: ma tram bya ba'i sdig can khyod //
NK072(nu)001:1325: sngon tshe dpal chen he ru kas //
NK072(nu)001:1326: bsgral nas dur khrod chen por byas //
NK072(nu)001:1327: zhes sogs lung du ma dang 'gal ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1330: khyod kyis ru tra dngos su bsgral ba yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1331: khyod kyis yab yum snyoms par sbyor ba'i sems sprin
NK072(nu)001:1332: las khro tshogs spro bsdu'i sbyor bas ru tra rnams
NK072(nu)001:1333: dngos su zhabs 'og tu mnan pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1337: khyod kyi zhabs 'og tu mnan pas da dung dgra zlar mthong ste /
NK072(nu)001:1338: khros pa'i gtum tshig smras pas /
NK072(nu)001:1339: lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs su bsdud pa'i h'u gsum gyi rngams sgra dang /
NK072(nu)001:1340: dug gsum zhal du gsol ba'i srog dbugs la rngams pa'i phyir ha gsum gyi bzhad sgra dang /
NK072(nu)001:1341: sha khrag rus gsum lhag ma ma lus par zhal du kh+aa hi gsum gyi dgyes sgra bcas te /
NK072(nu)001:1342: bdag 'dzin rtsad nas gcod phyir snying phyungs /
NK072(nu)001:1343: yul 'dzin gyi sgo dgag phyir dbang po //
NK072(nu)001:1344: mngon zhes dgag phyir nang khrol kun drangs /
NK072(nu)001:1345: las ngan gyi bag chags gcod phyir yan lag kun bcad gtubs nas gti mug sha kun zos /
NK072(nu)001:1347: zhe sdang rus pa kun 'chos nas phung po lhag
NK072(nu)001:1348: ma ma lus pa zhal du bstab nas bsgral ba
NK072(nu)001:1349: yin pa'i phyir / yang gong du thar pa nag
NK072(nu)001:1350: po lam gol nas las kyi ru trar skyes pa
NK072(nu)001:1351: yin pa'i phyir / de / sngon bskal pa kun
NK072(nu)001:1352: bkod kyi dus su dge slong thub dka' gzhon nu
NK072(nu)001:1354: thub dka' gzhon nu de rdo rje sems par sangs rgyas pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:1355: mched dan 'phag sa bcu'i byang sems gsang bdag tu
NK072(nu)001:1356: gyur pa'i thugs rje ye shes kyi gzigs nas yul
NK072(nu)001:1357: dang 'phrad pa'i thugs rjes mngon spyod drag po'i las
NK072(nu)001:1358: kyi brtul ba ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1359: le'u bco lnga pa 'di'i stod du gdul bya ru
NK072(nu)001:1360: tra gang zag dgos tshan pa gcig lam gol nas
NK072(nu)001:1361: gdul byar gzigs tshul bshad kyang 'dul byed sbyor sgrol
NK072(nu)001:1362: gyi phrin las kyi skabs su pho rgyud nyi shu
NK072(nu)001:1363: rtsa brgyad dang mo rgyud nyid shu rtsa brgyad sbyor
NK072(nu)001:1364: sgrol gyi sgo nas btul bar bshad pa las ru
NK072(nu)001:1365: tra brtul bar ma bshad pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1366: ma grub na ru tra chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1367: khyod skabs 'dir sbyor sgrol gyi phrin las kyi btul ba ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1368: sbyor sgrol phrin las kyi btul ba'i gdul bya pho
NK072(nu)001:1369: rgyud dang mo rgyud kyi nang du khyer mi 'dug
NK072(nu)001:1370: pa'i phyir / de'i rgyu mtshan sgrol byed dpal chen
NK072(nu)001:1371: pos de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas gsang ba'i yum
NK072(nu)001:1372: pa'i phyir / sprul te / mnyam par sbyor ba'i
NK072(nu)001:1373: sems sprin las khro bo 'chol pa mtha' yas par
NK072(nu)001:1374: pa'i phyir / sprul te / spros / 'jig rten
NK072(nu)001:1375: khams thams cad khro tshogs kyi khengs pa'i tsha ngam
NK072(nu)001:1376: drag shul gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten g.yos rab tu
NK072(nu)001:1377: g.yos pa la sogs pa'i ltas chen po bco lnga
NK072(nu)001:1378: pa'i phyir / sprul te / spros / bstan nas
NK072(nu)001:1379: / 'jig rten na dbang che ba'i lha ma h+aa
NK072(nu)001:1380: pa'i phyir / sprul te / spros / bstan nas
NK072(nu)001:1381: / de ba dang / gzi brjid che ba'i tshangs
NK072(nu)001:1382: pa'i phyir / sprul te / spros / bstan nas
NK072(nu)001:1383: / de ba dang / pa dang / mthu che
NK072(nu)001:1384: ba lha khyab mjug dang dbang phyug la sogs pa
NK072(nu)001:1385: thams cad khams 'khrugs nas dran pa nyams te brgyal
NK072(nu)001:1386: pa'i phyir / sprul te / spros / bstan nas
NK072(nu)001:1387: / de ba dang / pa dang / / rab
NK072(nu)001:1388: pa'i phyir / sprul te / spros / bstan nas
NK072(nu)001:1389: / de ba dang / pa dang / / tu
NK072(nu)001:1390: brgyal / kun tu brgyal bar gyur pa bshad pa'i
NK072(nu)001:1391: pa'i phyir / sprul te / spros / bstan nas
NK072(nu)001:1392: / de ba dang / pa dang / / tu
NK072(nu)001:1393: brgyal / phyir / gong du pho rgyud nyi shu
NK072(nu)001:1394: rtsa brgyad kyi nang du ru tra yod zer na
NK072(nu)001:1395: pa'i phyir / sprul te / spros / bstan nas
NK072(nu)001:1396: / de ba dang / pa dang / / tu
NK072(nu)001:1397: brgyal / phyir / / ru tra chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1398: khyod nyi shu rtsa brgyad ka dang /
NK072(nu)001:1399: de gang rung gcig tu zhen rigs par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1400: de gnyis gang rung gcig tu khas len rigs pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1402: nyi shu rtsa brgyad ka ma yin pa gang zhig /
NK072(nu)001:1403: nyi shu rtsa brgyad po gang rung gcig ma yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1405: pho rgyud nyi shu rtsa brgyad po chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1406: khyod rnams rgyud tha dad ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1407: khyod rnams ru tra dang rgyud gcig po'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1409: de ltar ma yin pa thal /
NK072(nu)001:1410: srin po da sha g+r+ai ba lha tshangs pa /
NK072(nu)001:1433: tshogs bdag byi na ya ga /
NK072(nu)001:1438: lha gsus po che ste nyer brgyad po gang rung re re ma yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1440: dpal chen po bsgral ba'i ru tra de bdag 'dzin gyi rtog pa yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1441: bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pa de yin par khas len pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1446: khungs dang rdzas bcas gang las byung //
NK072(nu)001:1447: khungs dang rdzas bcas bdag las byung //
NK072(nu)001:1448: bdag med stong pa'i tho bas gzhom //
NK072(nu)001:1450: gzhan yang gong du 'dir bshad pa'i ru tra sprul pa ba dang /
NK072(nu)001:1451: 'di dang cha 'dra ba'i ru tra rang rgyud pa zhig khas blangs pas /
NK072(nu)001:1452: 'di dang cha 'dra ba'i ru tra rang rgyud pa de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1453: khyod kyi tshod kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dngos su ma mthong par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1454: 'di dang cha 'dra ba'i ru tra gang zhig des de ltar ma mthong bar bshad pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:1456: khro bo'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang dbu dgu brgya phyag stong brgyad brgya /
NK072(nu)001:1458: sku 'bar ba chen po'i klong na bzhugs par mthong ngo zhes bshad pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1460: de dang cha 'dra'i ru ta ma yin par thal lo //
NK072(nu)001:1461: gzhan yang sdig pa gang che che sangs rgyas par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1462: mtshams med kyi las rngam po che byas pa'i ru
NK072(nu)001:1463: tra de sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong nas sangs rgyas
NK072(nu)001:1464: pa'i phyir / gzhan yang 'di nas bshad pa'i ru
NK072(nu)001:1465: tra de sprul pa yin zer ba yang mi 'thad
NK072(nu)001:1466: pa'i phyir / de / lung rig gnyis kyi grub pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1468: bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pa dang rtag pa la mngon par zhen nas /
NK072(nu)001:1471: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i ru tra chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1472: khyod kyi sems can gyi khams la bzhi brgya rtsa
NK072(nu)001:1473: bzhi'i nad 'bebs pa la sogs tho mtshams pa'i las
NK072(nu)001:1474: nag po de tsam byed pa mi srid par thal
NK072(nu)001:1475: / khyed rnam pa kun tu sems can mtha' dag la brtse ba ldan pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1477: khyod ru tra'i rnam par sprul pa la dgos pa med par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1478: khyod ru trar sprul nas sems can la las ngan gsog tu 'jug mi dgos pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1480: rang rgyud kyi mtshan nyid gang la byed /
NK072(nu)001:1481: skyon gyi snang tshul can la rang rgyud pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:1482: yon tan gyi snang tshul can la sprul par 'jog /
NK072(nu)001:1484: sems can gyi don du sangs rgyas byang sems sprul
NK072(nu)001:1485: pa bstan pa dang smad tshong la sogs pa'i rnam
NK072(nu)001:1486: par bstan pa de dag chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1487: khyod rang rgyud pa yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1488: 'jig rten na rngon pa smad tshong la sogs skyon gyi snang tshul can du byed pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1492: sprul pa yin pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:1493: rngon dang smad tshong la sogs pa /
NK072(nu)001:1494: sprul pa'i lus kyi 'dul bar byed //
NK072(nu)001:1496: gzhan yang ston pa sh+aakya thub pa de chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1498: khyod smad tshong pa'i cha byad can du byas pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1501: ma grub de 'dra med 'dra zer na /
NK072(nu)001:1502: de ltar yod tshul mdo sde myang 'das las /
NK072(nu)001:1504: de'i tshe'i dus na bdud sdig to can nga nyid yin te /
NK072(nu)001:1507: phyis 'di 'dra'i rang rgyud pa 'byung ba la dgongs zer ba yang mi 'thad de /
NK072(nu)001:1508: sngar dngos su ma byung na phyis kyang dngos su mi 'byung ba'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:1509: rgyu mtshan la khyad par med pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1510: mo rnams sbyor bas brtul ba'i tshe /
NK072(nu)001:1512: mo rgyud nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang dngos su sbyor ba mdzad par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1513: mo rnams sbyor ba mdzad nas brtul ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1514: 'dod na dpal chen po chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1515: khyod kyi sku la mo rgyud nyi shu rtsa brgyad ma 'khril par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1516: khyod kyi sku la phyogs kyi gtso mo bzhi dang /
NK072(nu)001:1517: sgo ma bzhi ste brgyad las ma 'khril ba'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:1518: gzhung nas de ltar gsal ba'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)001:1519: phyogs kyi lhag ma lnga lnga po de rnams rigs bzhi he ru ka dang 'khril ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1520: de ltar yang 'di nyid las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la tshangs ma dang /
NK072(nu)001:1521: khrag 'thung mo dang zhes sogs gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)001:1522: yang gong du nyi shu rtsa brgyad dngos su sbyor ba ma mdzad /
NK072(nu)001:1523: dpal chen po'i sku la brgyad dang /
NK072(nu)001:1524: rigs bzhi he ru ka'i sku la phyogs kyi lhag ma lnga lnga 'khril ba yin zer na /
NK072(nu)001:1525: 'o na dpal chen pos mo rgyud thams cad dang
NK072(nu)001:1526: sbyor ba mdzad nas brtul ba ma yin par thal
NK072(nu)001:1528: 'o na dpal chen po chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1529: khyod kyis mo rgyud yongs rdzogs dang sbyor ba mdzad nas ma btul bar thal /
NK072(nu)001:1530: khyod kyi phyogs kyi gtso mo bzhi dang /
NK072(nu)001:1531: sgo skyong gdong mo bzhi ma gtogs gzhan rnams dang sbyor ba mdzad nas ma btul ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1533: rigs bzhi he ru ka chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1534: khyod kyi sbyor ba mdzad te btul ba'i dregs pa mo rgyud yod par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1535: mo rgyud nyi shu rtsa brgyad las phyogs kyi gtso
NK072(nu)001:1536: mo ma gtogs pa'i lnga po lnga po rnams khyod
NK072(nu)001:1537: kyis sbyor ba mdzad nas btul ba yin pa'i phyir
NK072(nu)001:1539: phyogs kyi gtso mo rnams ma gtogs pa'i ma mo nyi shu po chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1540: khyod dpal chen pos btul ba ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1541: khyod rigs bzhi he ru kas btul ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1543: dpal chen pos btul nas ming gi dbang bskur nas
NK072(nu)001:1544: dkyil 'khor gyi khrag 'khyams la bkod pa ma yin
NK072(nu)001:1546: dbang phyug ma dang sbyor ba mdzad pa'i dbang phyug
NK072(nu)001:1547: ma re re'i kha nas nyer brgyad re ma thon
NK072(nu)001:1548: par thal / de ltar ma thon pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1550: de ltar thon pa gzhung las bshad pa dang 'gal lo //
NK072(nu)001:1552: de ltar thon pa yin zer na /
NK072(nu)001:1553: de ltar ma thon par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1554: ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sras nyi shu man ma byung ba'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:1557: sgo ma bzhi ste nyi shu las ma byung ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1560: khyod sras dang yum gnyis ka yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1565: khyod sras mo nyi shu'i nang tshan yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1566: khyod ma drangs par sras nyi shu ma tshang ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1569: khyod dpal chen po'i sku la 'khril ba ma yin par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1571: ru tra pho rgyud de rnams chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1572: khyod rnams la dpal chen pos dbang ma bskur bar thal /
NK072(nu)001:1573: khyod rnams dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su ma bkod pa gang zhig /
NK072(nu)001:1574: dbang rtags kyang ma bshad pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:1575: da lta sgrub thabs su yang dbang mo rnams la
NK072(nu)001:1576: lcags kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa re res dbu
NK072(nu)001:1577: brgyan pa'i dbang rgya yang bca' dgos shing /
NK072(nu)001:1578: pho rgyud rnams dbang rgya bca' ba yang ma bshad pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1580: pho rgyud rnams la dbang yang ma bskur /
NK072(nu)001:1581: dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su yang ma bkod zer na /
NK072(nu)001:1582: ston pa yab yum chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1583: khyod kyi bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting
NK072(nu)001:1584: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku gsung thugs
NK072(nu)001:1585: dbyer mi phyed pa'i rdo rje las dbang rdzas phyi
NK072(nu)001:1587: nang nyi zla byang chub kyi sems 'di phyungs nas
NK072(nu)001:1588: pho rgyud rnams la dbang bskur ba yin par thal
NK072(nu)001:1589: / khyod kyis badz+ra ma h+aa a mri ta ma h+aa kro d+h+aa am am am /
NK072(nu)001:1590: zhes lce steng du dam rdzas lan gsum bzhag nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1592: dbang bskur ba'i byin rlabs kyis pho rgyud rnams dran
