NK072(nu)001:1593: pa slar rnyed nas rtog tshogs sku dang ye shes
NK072(nu)001:1595: khro bo rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun
NK072(nu)001:1596: grub kyi ting nge 'dzin ni thob pa'i phyir ro
NK072(nu)001:1597: // gnyis pa dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su ma bkod zer na /
NK072(nu)001:1598: dregs pa pho rgyud de rnams chos can /
NK072(nu)001:1599: khyod dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su bkod par thal /
NK072(nu)001:1600: khyod khro bo thams cad kyi gdan du byas pa de khyod sdod pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1601: da ni de dag gi rnal ma'i lan mdo tsam zhig brjod na /
NK072(nu)001:1603: rtogs pas 'dag pa lta ba gnas lugs rtogs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu shes pa'o //
NK072(nu)001:1604: bshags pas 'dag pa stobs bzhi tshang ba'i gnyen pos 'dag pa /
NK072(nu)001:1605: mi dge ba chung ngu'i gnyen por spyad pas so //
NK072(nu)001:1606: de gsum dang mi ldan na myong 'gyur gyi las
NK072(nu)001:1607: yin pa myong bas 'dag ste ru tra bzhin no
NK072(nu)001:1608: // ru tra ma bsgral bar thal /
NK072(nu)001:1609: 'dir bsgral ba bdag 'dzin ru tra yin pa'i phyir la ma khyab ste /
NK072(nu)001:1610: ru tra thams cad kyi rtsa ba bdag 'dzin pas de gnyis gcig tu khas len dgos pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1611: ru tra zhes pa de lus ngag yid gsum phyin
NK072(nu)001:1612: ci log bdag tu bzung bas yid phyin ci log
NK072(nu)001:1613: tu bsgyur ba las ma tram ru tra /
NK072(nu)001:1614: ngag phyin ci log tu bsgyur ba la /
NK072(nu)001:1616: lus phyin ci log tu bsgyur ba a kar+sha ru tra de rnam pa gsum yin /
NK072(nu)001:1617: de bsgral tshul nang du snang gsum bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas pa'i tshe /
NK072(nu)001:1618: nang gi rtsa mdud grol ba'i rtags snang skyes bu
NK072(nu)001:1619: sangs rgyas pa de'i snang ngor bdud bzhi bcom pa'i
NK072(nu)001:1620: nyams kyi snang ba yin pa'i tshul le'u'i stod du
NK072(nu)001:1621: gang zag sgos tshan pa gcig yin par bshad pa
NK072(nu)001:1622: dang / sbyor sgrol gyi phrin las skabs de dngos
NK072(nu)001:1623: su mi 'byung ba dregs pa pho rgyud mo rgyud
NK072(nu)001:1624: dang / rnams 'byung ba / bdag 'dzin gyi ru
NK072(nu)001:1625: tra bcom na de'i rtsal las shar ba'i phyi rol
NK072(nu)001:1626: dregs pa rnams bcom pa'i tshul byung ba yin par
NK072(nu)001:1627: dang / rnams 'byung ba / mngon / ru tra
NK072(nu)001:1628: de pho rgyud nyi shu rtsa brgyad po gang rung
NK072(nu)001:1629: gcig tu khas ci la len /
NK072(nu)001:1630: de'i rtsal las shar ba der khas len pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:1631: de'i rtsar du khas len pa gnyis ka rnam pa 'gal ba can yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1632: ru tra sprul pa ba yin par khas blangs pa la skyon med de /
NK072(nu)001:1633: de'i dgos pa rang rgyud pa'i gol sa dgag pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:1634: gsang sngags kyi mthu'i che ba bstan pa la sogs
NK072(nu)001:1635: pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams g.yo 'gul byed pa'i
NK072(nu)001:1636: rdzu 'phrul ci la yod dgos te mi 'byung ba'i
NK072(nu)001:1637: phyir te / rang rgyud pa yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1638: 'on kyang phyir rol du yang 'di nas bshad pa
NK072(nu)001:1639: ltar gyi rtags snang 'byung tshul che chung gnyis khas
NK072(nu)001:1640: len dgos te rtsa mdud rags pa sbyor lam tshom
NK072(nu)001:1641: bu tshogs sgrub thar grol nas mthong lam sbyor ba
NK072(nu)001:1642: gcig dang / phra ba rgyun thar grol nas 'tshang rgya tshul gnyis bshad pas /
NK072(nu)001:1643: de bzhin phyi rol du'ang de ga'i cha 'dra 'byung ba khas len dgos te /
NK072(nu)001:1644: phyi nang 'gro ldog gcig pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)001:1645: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas mtshams med pa'i las ngan
NK072(nu)001:1646: byas pa ltar snang ba la skyon mi 'jug ste
NK072(nu)001:1647: / sngon ston pa ma ga d+ha rdo rje'i gdan du byon pa'ang sprul pa yin par bshad pas /
NK072(nu)001:1648: lhas byin kyang sprul par khas len pa nges don 'di'i skabs 'thad pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:1649: bcom ldan 'das kyi thun mong can ma yin pa'i
NK072(nu)001:1650: gsang ba chen po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen
NK072(nu)001:1651: po'i rgyud las / de nas gzhan yang thams cad
NK072(nu)001:1652: mkhyen pa'i 'khor gsum tshogs pa bshad par bya ste
NK072(nu)001:1653: 'jam dpal ni rgyal po zas gtsang mar gyur to
NK072(nu)001:1654: po'i rgyud las / // 'jig rten dbang phyug ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul du gyur to //
NK072(nu)001:1655: dpal lha mo ni grags 'dzin ma'o //
NK072(nu)001:1656: rdo rje sems dpa' ni sgra gcan 'dzin no //
NK072(nu)001:1657: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ni sha ri'i bu'o //
NK072(nu)001:1658: kun tu bzang po ni gnas brten kun dga' bor gyur to //
NK072(nu)001:1659: lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni gnas brten lhas byin no //
NK072(nu)001:1660: rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub par gyur to //
NK072(nu)001:1663: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa tshad gzung du med do //
NK072(nu)001:1664: rdo rje dra ba'i rgyud las /
NK072(nu)001:1665: gang dang gang gi gzugs kyi ni //
NK072(nu)001:1666: lus can rnams ni 'dul gyur ba //
NK072(nu)001:1667: de dang de ni rnam ston te //
NK072(nu)001:1668: sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no //
NK072(nu)001:1671: bdud kyi las rnams thugs chud kyang //
NK072(nu)001:1672: bdud kyi rjes su 'jug par mdzad //
NK072(nu)001:1674: sbyor ba'i skabs dpal chen pos dbang phyug nyi shu
NK072(nu)001:1675: rtsa brgyad sbyor ba mdzad par khas len dgos te
NK072(nu)001:1676: / dbang mo rnams kyi snang ngor yang dpal chen
NK072(nu)001:1677: po re re dang sbyor ba'i snang ba byung bar
NK072(nu)001:1678: / ma zad / rigs bzhi he ru ka yang
NK072(nu)001:1679: ston pa'i thugs me long lta bu la sogs pa
NK072(nu)001:1680: bzhi po'i rtsal snang rigs bzhir snang ba tsam du
NK072(nu)001:1681: ma zad 'dul byed gnyen po'i 'khor thams cad ston
NK072(nu)001:1682: pa'i thugs ye shes kyi rol rtsal tsam du khas
NK072(nu)001:1683: / ma zad / len dgos pa'o // sras mo
NK072(nu)001:1684: nyi shu las ma byung ba yang nyer brgyad po
NK072(nu)001:1685: re re kha nas nyi shu po re re yang
NK072(nu)001:1686: nyer brgyad re re thon so so yang rigs gcig
NK072(nu)001:1687: tu bsdus pa'i don yin par byos shig /
NK072(nu)001:1690: 'phros don zhig smros te brjod na /
NK072(nu)001:1691: ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos //
NK072(nu)001:1692: gzhan nas yod pa 'ongs ma yin //
NK072(nu)001:1693: thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid //
NK072(nu)001:1694: de lta bu yi ngang du 'byung //
NK072(nu)001:1696: dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi //
NK072(nu)001:1697: rin po che dang 'byung ba kun //
NK072(nu)001:1698: de dag rdzas yod ma yin te //
NK072(nu)001:1699: rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin //
NK072(nu)001:1700: zhes pa'i gzhung 'di la 'phros pa thal /
NK072(nu)001:1701: rgyu mtshan dper na lha ma yin gyi yul na dpag bsam gyi shing /
NK072(nu)001:1702: mi'i yul na yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
NK072(nu)001:1703: lha'i yul na rin po che'i bum pa bzang po
NK072(nu)001:1704: dang gsum po de la rang rang gi dgos 'dod
NK072(nu)001:1705: 'byung ba ltar / rang sems bsod nams dang ye
NK072(nu)001:1706: shes kyi mthu ting nge 'dzin ni brten pa las
NK072(nu)001:1707: dgos 'dod kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs
NK072(nu)001:1708: pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung tshul de bstan nas /
NK072(nu)001:1709: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul chen po
NK072(nu)001:1710: ni sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yin la
NK072(nu)001:1711: / de nyid thabs dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge
NK072(nu)001:1712: 'dzin la brten nas shes rab stong pa nyid kyi
NK072(nu)001:1713: rtsal snang las sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
NK072(nu)001:1714: de lta bu chos kyi dbyings kyi mkha' klong yangs
NK072(nu)001:1715: pa de'i ngang las byung ba yin no //
NK072(nu)001:1716: zhes ston par byed pa ni /
NK072(nu)001:1717: ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos //
NK072(nu)001:1721: 'khrul gzhi yod nas 'khrul lam med pa las 'khrul /
NK072(nu)001:1724: thang phrom zos pa'i rgan mo'i mig la nam mkha'
NK072(nu)001:1725: las skra shad 'dzag pa med bzhin du 'dzag pa'i
NK072(nu)001:1726: snang ba byung ltar yin pa'i phyir te /
NK072(nu)001:1728: nyi ma'i dkyil na mun med ltar //
NK072(nu)001:1730: gzhi rang bzhin rnam dag yod med dbu ma'i mtha'
NK072(nu)001:1731: las grol ba de rang ngo rang gi ma shes
NK072(nu)001:1733: drug gi 'gro ba thams cad kyi //
NK072(nu)001:1734: sems nyid nor bu rin po che //
NK072(nu)001:1735: ji ltar bsam pa snang ba las //
NK072(nu)001:1736: 'khrul gzhi yod med sgro skur med //
NK072(nu)001:1739: e ma bde gshegs snying po las //
NK072(nu)001:1740: rang gi rnam rtog las kyi sprul //
NK072(nu)001:1743: sman ga bur de tshad nad can la sman dang /
NK072(nu)001:1744: rlung nad can la dug tu 'gyur ba ltar yin te /
NK072(nu)001:1746: don gnyis yod med ris med las //
NK072(nu)001:1747: de yi rgyu rkyen rang bzhin pas //
NK072(nu)001:1748: sman gyi phan gnod ji bzhin du //
NK072(nu)001:1749: thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig pas //
NK072(nu)001:1750: mi mthun khyad par so sor snang //
NK072(nu)001:1753: ma rig pa nyid spang du med //
NK072(nu)001:1755: zhe sdang med na rang byung gi ye shes gsal mi thebs /
NK072(nu)001:1756: 'dod chags med na bde ba'i ye shes rgyud la mi skye /
NK072(nu)001:1757: gti mug med na rnam par mi rtog pa'i ngang la blo mi gnas /
NK072(nu)001:1758: nga rgyal med na chos nyid du la mi zla /
NK072(nu)001:1759: phrag dog med na mnyam pa nyid khod mi snyoms pa'o //
NK072(nu)001:1761: lam gyi nang na nye lam chen po ni /
NK072(nu)001:1762: thabs kyi nang na ma nor dam pa ste //
NK072(nu)001:1763: shes rab nang na shes rab khyad par can //
NK072(nu)001:1765: sngags kyi yongs su zin pa'i nad //
NK072(nu)001:1766: kun la gnod par byed mi nus //
NK072(nu)001:1767: de bzhin thabs kyi zin pa yis //
NK072(nu)001:1768: dug gsum sdug bsngal gnod byed mi 'gyur //
NK072(nu)001:1772: thabs dang shes rab ldan 'byor ba //
NK072(nu)001:1773: ma bskyed ma bsgul thams cad kyang //
NK072(nu)001:1774: phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas //
NK072(nu)001:1777: mdor na bsgul spyod thams cad kyang //
NK072(nu)001:1778: phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas //
NK072(nu)001:1779: zhes bshad pa nang 'gal zhe na skyon med de /
NK072(nu)001:1780: lta ba'i ngos nas gong ma dang /
NK072(nu)001:1781: spyod pa'i ngos nas 'og ma bzhag pa ste /
NK072(nu)001:1783: rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po ni //
NK072(nu)001:1784: phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun //
NK072(nu)001:1785: rigs lnga bde gshegs yab yum gyi //
NK072(nu)001:1786: phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas //
NK072(nu)001:1788: de yang spyir phyag rgya'i don /
NK072(nu)001:1789: 'da' dka' ba dang mdzes par byed pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:1791: dper na rgyal ba'i bka' rtags dang /
NK072(nu)001:1793: nyo tshong mkhan gyi phu dung bzhin shes par bya'o //
NK072(nu)001:1794: gnyis pa'i le'u zhes 'dug pas rgyal ba la mnyes
NK072(nu)001:1795: mi mnyes mnga' na gzung 'dzin can du 'gyur ro
NK072(nu)001:1797: rgyal ba la mnyes mi mnyes mi mnga' yang /
NK072(nu)001:1798: gdul bya rnams kyi tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i ched du
NK072(nu)001:1799: mnyes pa ltar snang ba la 'gal ba med pa'o
NK072(nu)001:1800: // 'dir skabs de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po zhes pa ci zer na /
NK072(nu)001:1801: sangs rgyas la dgyes mi dgyes kyi tha snyad mi yong yang /
NK072(nu)001:1802: longs spyod la mtshan du btags pa ste /
NK072(nu)001:1803: dga' ba la rnam dbye bzhi las /
NK072(nu)001:1804: thun mong gi dga' ba ni 'dod khams 'dod chags
NK072(nu)001:1805: kyi bde ba la spyod pa dang khams gong ma
NK072(nu)001:1806: gnyis bsam gtan gyi dga' ba la spyod pa dang
NK072(nu)001:1807: / sa dang por bden pa mthong ba'i zag med kyi bde la spyod pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:1808: 'dir ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bde ba ste /
NK072(nu)001:1809: blang dor med pa'i chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la longs spyod pa'i dga' ba'o //
NK072(nu)001:1813: gzhi don gyi gnas lugs de rtogs byed rgyu'i lta ba goms byed rkyen ting nge 'dzin /
NK072(nu)001:1814: de gnyis kyis mngon du gyur pa'i 'bras bu ste /
NK072(nu)001:1815: de bzhin rgyud 'di'i don mtha' dag 'dus pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis yin te /
NK072(nu)001:1816: dang po lhag pa kun rdzob kyis gnas lugs gsum
NK072(nu)001:1817: par de shes byed yang dag pa'i lta ba 'jog
NK072(nu)001:1819: bzhi par de yi ges mtshon nas nyams su len tshul ting nge 'dzin /
NK072(nu)001:1820: drug par des mngon du byas pa'i 'bras bu sku lnga'i grub tshul lo //
NK072(nu)001:1821: dug gsum spyad sbyar bshad pa'i don /
NK072(nu)001:1823: ma 'gags snang ba thabs yin te //
NK072(nu)001:1824: rang bzhin med pa'i shes rab yin //
NK072(nu)001:1826: zhes pa'i don la blo 'byor na skyon med do //
NK072(nu)001:1828: pha mes thams cad mes tshig nas shi ba'i mi zhig na re /
NK072(nu)001:1829: me 'di sreg pa kho na'o snyam pa la /
NK072(nu)001:1831: ri dwags me byi dkar po bya ba me la
NK072(nu)001:1832: gnas bcas nas zas su yang me za skom du
NK072(nu)001:1833: yang me 'thung ba zhig mthong nas de'i mngon ldog
NK072(nu)001:1834: pa bzhin no // yang na thal mo rab bsnol nas //
NK072(nu)001:1837: thal mo zhes pa brdeg pa'i sgra //
NK072(nu)001:1838: dbang po'i yul du rab sbyor bas //
NK072(nu)001:1839: phyag rgya chen po nam mkha'i dbyings //
NK072(nu)001:1840: brtul zhugs gnyis kyis phang du blangs //
NK072(nu)001:1841: rdo rje mdzub mo'i rtse dag tu //
NK072(nu)001:1842: til 'bru nam mkha'i gzhal yas su //
NK072(nu)001:1843: ri rab tsam gyi phyag rgya 'god //
NK072(nu)001:1845: mdo rgyud rnams nas dus ring thung mi mthun pa bshad pa ci /
NK072(nu)001:1847: spyi tsam du 'bras bu 'grub pa'i dus la theg
NK072(nu)001:1848: pa che chung sna tshogs nas dus kyi tshad gcig
NK072(nu)001:1849: tu nges bzung med par bshad pa ni so skye'i
NK072(nu)001:1850: gnas skabs su grags tshod yin cing /
NK072(nu)001:1851: nges pa'i don du ni tshad nges par bzung du mi rung ste /
NK072(nu)001:1852: gang gis phyir na dus ni sems kyi snang ba yin la /
NK072(nu)001:1853: sems la dbang ma thob kyi bar du ni yul
NK072(nu)001:1854: dang dus rnams kyang so sor bstan par nges par
NK072(nu)001:1855: snang la sems la dbang thob phan chad ni yul
NK072(nu)001:1856: dang dus la ci dgar snang ngo //
NK072(nu)001:1857: de ltar yang dgongs pa nges 'grel las /
NK072(nu)001:1858: sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa sbyong ba'i tshad nges pa med de /
NK072(nu)001:1860: dri ma med par grags pa'i mdo las kyang /
NK072(nu)001:1861: dus thung bar 'dod pa rnams la bskal pa mang
NK072(nu)001:1862: po zhag bdun gyis 'da' bar byin gyis rlabs so
NK072(nu)001:1863: // zhes gsungs pas sems la dbang thob pas ji
NK072(nu)001:1864: ltar 'dod pa bzhin snang bar yin par bshad do
NK072(nu)001:1865: // // ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon //
NK072(nu)001:1867: dur khrod kyi chas dang dpal gyi chas ni /
NK072(nu)001:1868: dpal chen po'i sku la rang chas su gnas pa ni dpal gyi chas te /
NK072(nu)001:1869: 'khor ba'i rgyu ldog pa'i brda dbu skra gyen du bardzesa pa /
NK072(nu)001:1870: thabs shes kyi brdar rdo rje'i khyung gshog rtag chad zil gnon gyi chas snyan gong du cod pan /
NK072(nu)001:1871: rig pa mi 'gyur ba'i chas spyi bor rdo rje phyed pas mtshan pa /
NK072(nu)001:1872: ba spu rdo rje'i go khrab kyis gtoms pa gzi 'bar gyi chas /
NK072(nu)001:1873: yum la gnyis med sbyor ba rang rig pa'i ye
NK072(nu)001:1874: shes shes rab stong pa nyid dang mi 'bral ba'i
NK072(nu)001:1875: chas / gnod gdug zlog byed dpa' bo lcags kyi chas /
NK072(nu)001:1876: nyon mongs sreg byed sku las me 'od 'phro ba
NK072(nu)001:1877: rdo rje me'i chas te dpal gyi chas brgyad dang
NK072(nu)001:1878: / de dag gi steng du byang sems brtan pa'i
NK072(nu)001:1879: brdar snyan gong gnyis su nyi zlas brgyan pa ste
NK072(nu)001:1881: nyi zla gnyis so sor drangs pas chas bcu zhes kyang zer te /
NK072(nu)001:1882: brtsi tshul 'di ni sgyu 'phrul ba sogs snga 'gyur yongs grags kyi lugs yin /
NK072(nu)001:1883: gzhan du 'dus pa mdo'i rtsa rgyud kun 'dus rig pa dang /
NK072(nu)001:1884: bka' brgyad bder 'dus kyi rtsa rgyud rnams su /
NK072(nu)001:1885: dpa' bo chen po stag gi chas sogs dpal chas
NK072(nu)001:1886: bcu 'di dang 'dren tshul mi gcig tsam zhig 'byung
NK072(nu)001:1887: / rgyal byed dpa' rtags kyi rgyan zhes dur khrod kyi chas brgyad ni /
NK072(nu)001:1888: sngon dpal chen pos drag po 'jigs byed chen po
NK072(nu)001:1889: btul ba'i tshe de'i rgyan rnams sku la mnabs pa
NK072(nu)001:1890: ste / de la dur khrod kyi chas brgyad ni /
NK072(nu)001:1891: thod skam lnga'i dbu rgyan dang thod rlon lnga bcu'i do shal te thod rgyan dang /
NK072(nu)001:1892: klu rigs lnga sbrul rnam par byas pa sbrul rgyan te gdags pa'i rgyan gnyis /
NK072(nu)001:1893: dpral bar thal chen gyi tshom bu smin mtshams sam /
NK072(nu)001:1895: mgrin par zhag gi zo ris te byug pa'i rtsi gsum /
NK072(nu)001:1896: glang chen gyi ko rlon dang zhing chen gyi g.yang gzhi'i stod g.yogs /
NK072(nu)001:1897: stag lpags kyi shams thabs te bgo ba'i gos gsum rnams so //
NK072(nu)001:1898: yang lugs gcig la dur khrod kyis chas brgyad ni /
NK072(nu)001:1901: bgo ba'i gos gsum ste brgyad do //
NK072(nu)001:1902: dang po la nang gses su dbye na /
NK072(nu)001:1903: thod skam lnga rigs lnga'i rtse phran can gyi dbu brgyan /
NK072(nu)001:1904: thod rlon lnga bcu'i tshar gsum thod pa'i do shal te thod rgyan gnyis sam /
NK072(nu)001:1905: 'ga' zhig tu thod tshal gyi dpung rgyan bsnan nas gsum du bshad /
NK072(nu)001:1906: klu rgyal rigs dkar pos skra bcings /
NK072(nu)001:1907: rje rigs ser pos snyan cha bram ze'i rigs dmar pos se mo do dang mgul chu /
NK072(nu)001:1908: dmangs rigs ljang gus ska rags dang do shal /
NK072(nu)001:1909: gdol pa nag pos gdu bu ste sbrul rgyan lnga /
NK072(nu)001:1911: dpral bar thal chen gyi tshom bu rdo rje rtse gsum ris /
NK072(nu)001:1912: smin mtshams sam 'bur bzhi ru rak+ta'i thig le 'dab bzhi'i ris /
NK072(nu)001:1913: mgrin par zhag gi zo ris zla gam ris so //
NK072(nu)001:1918: yang bshad tshul gcig la dpal gyi chas brgyad dang dur khrod kyi chas brgyad las /
NK072(nu)001:1920: khyab mdzad re skong rdo rje gshog pa'i chas //
NK072(nu)001:1921: gnod gdug bzlog mdzad rgya gram ljags kyi chas //
NK072(nu)001:1922: ting 'dzin rab brjid dpa' bo stag gi chas //
NK072(nu)001:1923: dbang gi bse khrab gzi 'bar bkod pa'i chas //
NK072(nu)001:1924: dpa' brjid gnyen lcug sprul nag 'khyil ba'i chas //
NK072(nu)001:1925: gzi mdangs che ba chu srin sprul pa'i chas //
NK072(nu)001:1926: rdo rje rtse lnga rig pa klag pa'i chas //
NK072(nu)001:1927: bskal me ltar sreg rdo rje me yi chas //
NK072(nu)001:1930: theg mchog stobs rdzogs glang chen ko rlon rtags //
NK072(nu)001:1931: byang sems ma nyams zhing gi g.yang gzhi'i rtags //
NK072(nu)001:1932: dpa' gtum drag po'i las mdzad stag shams rtags //
NK072(nu)001:1933: yab yum gnyis med 'khril ba'i sbrul chun dang //
NK072(nu)001:1934: dus gsum sangs rgyas bdag nyid thod phreng gsum //
NK072(nu)001:1935: phrin las phyi gshol med pa'i thal chen dang //
NK072(nu)001:1936: thugs rje chags pa'i rak+ta'i thig le che //
NK072(nu)001:1937: don dam gnas lugs bcud ldan zhag zo ris //
NK072(nu)001:1938: byang sems dkar dmar brtan pa'i nyi zlas rgyan //
NK072(nu)001:1939: bsnan pa'i dpal gyi chas bcur bzhed pa'o //
NK072(nu)001:1941: bgo ba ko rlon gyi gos sna tshogs pa ste
NK072(nu)001:1942: thabs mkhas phrin las kyi gos zhing gi g.yang gzhi
NK072(nu)001:1943: / khyab pa thugs rje'i gos glang chen gyi ko rlon /
NK072(nu)001:1944: phyi nang gsang ba sdud pa'i gos stag lpags kyi shams thabs rnams so //
NK072(nu)001:1945: gzhan rnams bshad pa gong dang 'dra /
NK072(nu)001:1947: gzi brjid 'bar ba chu srin brjid pa'i chas //
NK072(nu)001:1948: thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel nyi zla'i chas //
NK072(nu)001:1949: gdug pa can bsreg ye shes me yi chas //
NK072(nu)001:1950: skye shi rtsad gcod mche ba zla tshes chas //
NK072(nu)001:1951: khyab mdzad re skong rdo rje gshog pa'i chas //
NK072(nu)001:1952: mnga' thang yongs rdzogs rdo rje klag pa'i chas //
NK072(nu)001:1953: sangs rgyas sar bgrod dbang gi bse khrab chas //
NK072(nu)001:1954: gnod gdug bzlog mdzad rgya gram ljags kyis chas //
NK072(nu)001:1956: rus pa'i phyag rgya drug ni /
NK072(nu)001:1957: spyi bo'i 'khor lo mi bskyod pa /
NK072(nu)001:1960: phyag zhabs kyi gdu bu bzhi rnam snang /
NK072(nu)001:1961: ska rags zhes smad rgyan don grub /
NK072(nu)001:1962: se ral kha'am mchod thogs zhes rdor sems kyi phyag rgya ste drug go //
NK072(nu)001:1963: phyag rgya lnga ni se ral kha spangs pa'i dang po lnga'o //
NK072(nu)001:1968: brjid pa nyi shu ste brgyad cus mnga' gsol ba'o //
NK072(nu)001:1969: slob ma'i skyon bzhi dang yon tan lnga las /
NK072(nu)001:1975: ngang chu bo chen po'i gzhung bzhin ring ba /
NK072(nu)001:1976: tshul dge sbyor dag gsar bur ltar zhib pa /
NK072(nu)001:1977: bsam pa rin po che gser ltar bzang ba /
NK072(nu)001:1978: blo ri rab ltar brtan cing mi 'gyur ba /
NK072(nu)001:1979: shes rab dang snying rje nogs thub pa ste lnga'o //
NK072(nu)001:1980: yang na cis kyang sems mi 'khrug pas ngang bzang /
NK072(nu)001:1981: skye bo rnams kyi spyod pa las log pas tshul shes /
NK072(nu)001:1982: blo mi 'gyur ba rab tu brtan nas /
NK072(nu)001:1983: lus dang longs spyod chos phyir gtong phod pa /
NK072(nu)001:1984: dad pa dang shes rab che ba'o //
NK072(nu)001:1985: dri ba'i lan btab zin no //
NK072(nu)001:1987: rtogs daka'i gnas la dri tshig bdun gyi lan //
NK072(nu)001:1988: kun lan thebs pa sangs 'phags kho na'i yul //
NK072(nu)001:1989: mi shes mdud pa snying rje'i tshig gis dkrol //
NK072(nu)001:1990: rnam dkar dge ba byang chen rgyu ru bsngo //
NK072(nu)001:1991: zhes pa 'di ni rang gi nye bar gnas pa
NK072(nu)001:1992: gnas lnga smra ba dwags po o rgyan blo gsal
NK072(nu)001:1993: gyi dri len du smin gling grwa pa'i tha shal
NK072(nu)001:1994: ba d+harma kirtisa rang lo re gcig pa gnas chen
NK072(nu)001:1995: chu bo ri tshe chu bkod pa'i sgrub sde'i bla
NK072(nu)001:1996: brang du me 'brug dbo zla'i yar tshes kyi dus
NK072(nu)001:1997: dge bar bris pa dge legs su gyur cig //
NK072(nu)001:1998: 'dis kyang gsang chen bstan pa rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig //
